XXsamghscu:123: dvādaśagaṃgānadībālikāsamānān tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām antike duṣṭacittam utpādayed, yaś cemaṃ saṃghāṭasūtraṃ pratikṣiped, ayaṃ tato bahutaraṃ pāpakam akuśalaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyati. 4. ato 'pi sarvaśūra bahutaram akuśalaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyanti ye mahāyāne āghātacittam

XXsamghscu:129: [SaSū(C) 38] 1. sarvaśūro bodhisatva āha: na śakyaṃ bhagavan! 2. bhagavān
XXsamghscu:131: [SaSū(C) 39] 1. punar aparaṃ sarvaśūra: tadyathāpināma dvitīyaḥ puruṣo
XXsamghscu:132: bhavet; sa tīkṣṇena śastreṇāparasya satvasya prahāraṃ dadyāt: sa na śaknuyād ekaprahāreṇa jīvitād vyavaropayituṃ; kiṃ cāpi sarvaśūra tasya vraṇam utpadyeta; atha ca punar bhaiṣajyayogaṃ kartavyaṃ tadā vraṇāt
XXsamghscu:133: parimucyate; 2. yadā parimukto bhavati tadā duḥkhaṃ smarati: aham idānīñ jānāmi, na kadācit punaḥ pāpakam akuśalaṃ karmābhisaṃskāraṃ kariṣyāmi.
XXsamghscu:134: [SaSū(C) 40] 1. evam eva sarvaśūra sa puruṣo yadā narake duḥkhaṃ smarati

XXsamghscu:137: tadyathāpināma sarvaśūra mṛtasya puruṣasya mātāpitarau: śocanti paridevanti na ca śaknuvanti trātum; 5. evam eva sarvaśūra bālapṛthagjanāḥ satvā na śaknuvanty ātmahitaṃ parahitaṃ vā kartuṃ, nirāśā iva mātāpitaraḥ;
XXsamghscu:138: 6. evam eva sarvaśūra nirāśā bhavanti te satvā maraṇakālasamaye.

XXsamghscu:140: [SaSū(C) 42] 1. sarvaśūro bodhisatva āha: kā bhadanta bhagavaṃs teṣāṃ satvānāṃ gatiḥ, ko 'bhisaṃparāyo bhavati? bhagavān āha: anantā gatiḥ sarvaśūra saddharmapratikṣepakānāṃ satvānāṃ, ananto 'bhisaṃparāyaḥ: 3.
XXsamghscu:141: kalpam eva te sarvaśūra raurave mahānarake duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayiṣyanti,
XXsamghscu:142: 4. kalpaṃ saṃghāte, 5. kalpaṃ tapane, 6. kalpaṃ pratāpane, 7. kalpaṃ kālasūtre mahānarake, 8. kalpaṃ mahāvīcau mahānarake, 9. kalpaṃ romaharṣe mahānarake, 10. kalpaṃ hahave mahānarake. 11. imeṣv aṣṭasu mahānarakeṣu
XXsamghscu:143: sarvaśūra aṣṭau kalpāḥ saddharmapratikṣepakaiḥ satvair duḥkham
XXsamghscu:145: [SaSū(C) 43] 1. atha khalu sarvaśūro bodhisatvo mahāsatvo bhagavantam etad
XXsamghscu:146: avocat: duḥkhaṃ bhagavan duḥkhaṃ sugata notsahāmi śrotuṃ! 2. atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyām imā gāthā abhāṣata:
XXsamghscu:147: (1) kim tvaṃ notsahase śrotum idaṃ vākyaṃ mahābhayam /
XXsamghscu:149: (2) yat karoti śubhaṃ karma sukhaṃ tasya bhaviṣyati /
XXsamghscu:150: yat karoty aśubhaṃ karma duḥkham eva bhaviṣyati //
XXsamghscu:151: (3) jātasya maraṇaṃ duḥkhaṃ śokaṃ duḥkho 'tha bandhanaṃ /
XXsamghscu:152: nityaṃ duḥkhaṃ hi bālasya sukhaheto na vetti yaḥ //
XXsamghscu:153: (4) paṇḍitānāṃ sukhaṃ yo vai smarate buddhadakṣiṇāṃ /
XXsamghscu:154: prasannāś ca mahāyāne na te yāsyanti durgatim //
XXsamghscu:156: alpaṃ hi kṛyate karma mahāntaṃ bhujyate phalaṃ //
XXsamghscu:157: (6) bījam alpaṃ yathā vāpya prabhūtaṃ labhate phalaṃ /
XXsamghscu:158: buddhakṣetre tu sukṣetre vījaṃ vai yatra rūhyate //
XXsamghscu:161: (8) āṇumātraṃ pradāsyanti ye dānaṃ mama śāsane /
XXsamghscu:163: (9) yatra yatropapadyante nityaṃ dānaṃ smaranti te /
XXsamghscu:164: evaṃ mahāphalā hy eṣā gaṃbhīrā buddhadakṣiṇā //
XXsamghscu:165: [SaSū(C) 44] 1. atha khalu sarvaśūro bodhisatvo mahāsatvo bhagavantam etad
XXsamghscu:166: avocat: kathaṃ bhagavan bhagavataḥ śāsane dharmo jñātavyaḥ? kathaṃ bhagavan saṃghāṭaṃ sūtraṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā kuśalamūlaṃ parigṛhītaṃ bhaviṣyati? 2. bhagavān āha: yaḥ sarvaśūra dvādaśagaṃgānadībālikāsamāṃs
XXsamghscu:167: tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān sarvasukhopadhānairupatiṣṭheta, yaś cemaṃ saṃghāṭasūtraṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śṛṇuyād evam eva tasya puṇyaskandho
XXsamghscu:169: [SaSū(C) 45] 1. sarvaśūro bodhisatva āha: kathaṃ bhagavan kuśalamūlaparipūriḥ kartavyā evam ukte bhagavān sarvaśūraṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam etad avocat: yat sarvaśūra kuśalamūlaṃ tat tathāgatasamaṃ jñātavyaṃ. 3. sarvaśūra āha: katamac ca bhagavan kuśalamūlaṃ tathāgatasamaṃ jñātavyaṃ? bhagavān āha: dharmabhāṇakaḥ sarvaśūra tathāgatasamo jñātavyaḥ. 5. sarvaśūra āha: katamo bhagavan dharmabhāṇakaḥ?
XXsamghscu:170: 6. bhagavān āha: yaḥ saṃghāṭaṃ sūtraṃ śrāvayati sa dharmabhāṇakaḥ.
XXsamghscu:171: [SaSū(C) 46] 1. sarvaśūro bodhisatva āha: ye bhagavan saṃghāṭasūtraṃ
XXsamghscu:172: dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyanti te īdṛśaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyanti; kaḥ punar vādo ye likhiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti; kiyantaṃ te bhagavan puṇyaskandhaṃ
XXsamghscu:173: prasaviṣyanti? 2. bhagavān āha: śṛṇu sarvaśūra, tadyathā caturṣu dikṣv
XXsamghscu:174: ekaikasyān diśi dvādaśagaṃgānadībālikāsamāṃs tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāṃ dvādaśagaṃgānadībālikāsamān kalpān avatiṣṭhanto dharmaṃ deśayeyur; asya saṃghāṭasūtrasya dharmaparyāyasya puṇyaskandhaṃ varṇayeyur lekhayatas tasya puṇyaskandhasya na śakyaṃ paryantam adhigantuṃ, vācayā vā vyāhartuṃ. 3. aṣṭācatvāriṅśadbhir api gaṃgānādibālikāsamair buddhair bhagavadbhir na śakyaṃ likhyamānasya yat puṇyaskandhaṃ tad vyāhartuṃ. 4.
XXsamghscu:175: kaḥ punar vādo ye vācayiṣyanti, cintayiṣyanti vā, ye vā dharmadhyānā
XXsamghscu:177: [SaSū(C) 47] 1. sarvaśūro bodhisatva āha: kiyantaṃ bhagavan vācayamānāḥ
XXsamghscu:178: puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyanti? 2. atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyām imā
XXsamghscu:180: (1) catuṣpadāyāṃ gāthāyāṃ vācitāyāṃ tu yac chubhaṃ /
XXsamghscu:181: caturaśīti gaṃgāyā bālikā syuḥ samā jināḥ //

XXsamghscu:183: na ca kṣīyeta tat puṇyaṃ vāvad vyākaraṇaṃ bhavet //

XXsamghscu:188: [SaSū(C) 48] tena khalu punaḥ kālena tena samayena caturaśītir
XXsamghscu:189: devaputrakoṭiśatasahasrāṇi, yena tathāgato, yena ca saṃghāṭasūtraṃ
XXsamghscu:190: dharmaparyāyanirdeśaṃ, tenāṃjalayaḥ praṇamya, bhagavantam etad avocan:
XXsamghscu:191: sādhu sādhu bhagavan yena bhagavatā īdṛśaṃ dharmanidhānaṃ jaṃbudvīpe sthāpitaṃ.
XXsamghscu:192: (49) 1. aṣṭādaśa koṭīsahasrāṇi nigranthānāṃ, yena bhagavāms tenopasaṃkrāntā, upasaṃkramya, bhagavantam evam āhuḥ: jayatu bhoḥ śramaṇo
XXsamghscu:193: gautamaḥ! 2. bhagavān āha: tathāgato nityam eva jayati. bho nigranthatīrthikāḥ kathaṃ yuṣmākaṃ tīrthikānāṃ jayam? 3. te 'vocan: jayatv jayatv eva śramaṇo gautamaḥ! 4. bhagavān āha: nāhaṃ yuṣmākaṃ jayaṃ
XXsamghscu:195: (1) viparītā sthitā yūyaṃ bhaviṣyati jayaḥ kathaṃ /
XXsamghscu:196: yūyaṃ śṛṇutha nigranthā vakṣyāmi bhavatāṃ hitaṃ //
XXsamghscu:197: (2) bālabuddheḥ sukhaṃ nāsti kiṃ jayaṃ vo bhaviṣyati /
XXsamghscu:198: mārgaṃ tu te na jānaṃti ko jayaṃ te bhaviṣyati /
XXsamghscu:199: ahaṃ mārgaṃ tu darśemi gaṃbhīraṃ buddhacakṣuṣā //
XXsamghscu:200: [SaSū(C) 50] 1. atha te nigranthā bhagavato 'ntike kruddhā aprasādacittam utpādayām āsuḥ. 2. tena khalu punaḥ kālena tena samayena śakro devānām indro vajraṃ parāhanat.
XXsamghscu:201: [SaSū(C) 51] 1. atha te 'ṣṭādaśa koṭyo nigranthānāṃ, bhītās, trastā,
XXsamghscu:202: mahātā duḥkhadaurmanasyenārtā aśrukaṇṭhā rudanti. 2. tathāgataś ca svakam
XXsamghscu:203: ātmānam antardhitaṃ darśayati sma. 3. atha te nigranthā asrumukhā rudanti,
XXsamghscu:205: (1) nāsti kaścid iha trāṇāṃ na mātā na pitā tathā /
XXsamghscu:207: (2) udakaṃ caiva naivāsti na vṛkṣā na ca pakṣīṇāḥ /
XXsamghscu:208: janaṃ cātra na paśyāma anāthā duḥkhavedanāṃ //
XXsamghscu:210: [SaSū(C) 52] 1. tena khalu punaḥ kālena tena samayena te 'ṣṭādaśa koṭyo nigranthānām utthāyāyanebhyo, jānudvayaṃ bhūmau nipātya, śabdam
XXsamghscu:213: kuruṣva hitam asmākaṃ trāyasva kṛpaṇaṃ jagat //
XXsamghscu:214: [SaSū(C) 53] 1. atha bhagavān smitaṃ prāduṣkṛtvā sarvaśūraṃ bodhisatvaṃ
XXsamghscu:215: mahāsatvam āmantrayati: gaccha sarvaśūra, nigranthānām anyatīrthikānān dharman deśaya. 2. evam ukte sarvaśūro bodhisatvo mahāsatvo bhagavantam
XXsamghscu:216: etad avocat: nanu bhagavan kālaparvatāḥ sumeroḥ parvatarājasya śirasā
XXsamghscu:217: praṇamanti? tiṣṭhati tathāgate, 'haṃ dharman deśayāmi? 3. bhagavān āha:
XXsamghscu:218: alaṃ kulaputra, bahu tathāgatānām upāyakauśalyaṃ. 4. gaccha sarvaśūra,
XXsamghscu:219: vyavalokaya daśa diśa, lokadhātūn paśya, kva tathāgataṃ paśyasi, kutra vā tathāgatasyāsanaṃ prajñaptaṃ paśyasi. 5. aham eva sarvaśūra nigranthānāṃ anyatīrthikānāṃ dharman deśayiṣyāmi.
XXsamghscu:220: [SaSū(C) 54] 1. sarvaśūro bodhisatva āha: kasya bhadanta bhagavan
XXsamghscu:221: ṛddhyānubhāvena gacchāmi? svaṛddher vā, atha vā tathāgatasya
XXsamghscu:222: rddhyānubhāvena gacchāmi? 2. bhagavān āha: svakena sarvaśūra ṛddhibalādhiṣṭhānena gaccha, punar eva sarvaśūra tathāgatasya
XXsamghscu:223: rddhyanubhāvenāgacchaḥ. 3. atha khalu sarvaśūro bodhisatvo mahāsatva utthāyāsanād, bhagavantaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya, tatraivāntardhitaḥ.
XXsamghscu:224: [SaSū(C) 55] 1. atha khalu bhagavāṃs teṣām anyatīrthikānāṃ dharman
XXsamghscu:225: deśayati: 2. jātir mārṣā duḥkhaṃ, jātir eva duḥkhaṃ, jātasya sato bahūni
XXsamghscu:226: bhayāny utpadyante: jātasya vyādhibhayāny utpadyante, vyādhitasya jarābhayāny utpadyante, jīrṇasya mṛtyubhayany utpadyante. 3. ta āhuḥ:
XXsamghscu:228: [SaSū(C) 56] 1. bhagavān āha: jātaṃ jātam iti nāma! 2. jātasya puruṣasya bahūni bhayāni jāyante, 3. tadyathā: rājabhayaṃ jāyate, 4. corabhayaṃ
XXsamghscu:229: jāyate, 5. agnibhayaṃ jāyate, 6. viṣabhayaṃ jāyate, 7. udakabhayaṃ jāyate,
XXsamghscu:230: 8. vāyubhayaṃ jāyate, 9. āvartabhayaṃ jāyate, 10. svakṛtānāṃ karmaṇāṃ bhayaṃ jāyate.
XXsamghscu:231: [SaSū(C) 57] evaṃ tena kālena tena samayena teṣām anyatīrthikānāṃ nigranthānāṃ mahāsantrāso 'bhavad, evaṃ cāhuḥ: na bhūyo vayaṃ bhagavann utsahāmahe jatiduḥkham anubhavitum!
XXsamghscu:232: [SaSū(C) 58] 1. asmin khalu punaḥ saṃghāṭe dharmaparyāye bhagavatā
XXsamghscu:233: bhāṣyamāṇe, te 'ṣṭādaśa koṭyo nigranthā anyatīrthikāḥ pariniṣpannā abhūvann anuttarasyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ; 2. svakāye cāṣṭādaśa bodhisatvasahasrāḥ daśabhūmipratiṣṭhitāḥ, sarve nānārddhivikurvitāni sandarśayām āsuḥ; 3. tadyathā: aśvarūpaṃ, hastirūpaṃ, siṃharūpaṃ,
XXsamghscu:234: vyāghrarūpaṃ, garuḍarūpaṃ, sumerurūpaṃ, nandikarūpaṃ, kecid vṛkṣarūpaṃ. 4.
XXsamghscu:235: te sarve padmāsane paryaṃkena niṣīdanti. 5. nava koṭīsahasrāṇi bodhisatvānāṃ bhagavato dakṣiṇe pārśve niṣīdanti. nava koṭīsahasrāṇi bodhisatvānāṃ bhagavato vāme pārśve niṣīdanti. 6. tathāgatas tu nityaṃ
XXsamghscu:236: samāhitaḥ upāyakauśalyena satvānāṃ dharman deśayan saṃdṛśyate.
XXsamghscu:237: [SaSū(C) 59] 1. yāvat saptame rātṛdivase tathāgataḥ pāṇitalaṃ prasārayati,
XXsamghscu:238: jānāti ca bhagavān: sarvaśūro bodhisatvo mahāsatvas tasyāḥ padmottarāyā lokadhātor ihāgacchatīti; 2. yadā ca sarvaśūro bodhisatvo mahāsatvo gatas,
XXsamghscu:239: tadā sapta rātrindivasais tāṃ padmottarāṃ lokadhātum anuprāptaḥ,
XXsamghscu:240: svaṛddhibalādhiṣṭhānena, 3. yadā ca bhagavān bahuṃ prasārayati, tadā sarvaśūro bodhisatvo mahāsatvo bhagavataḥ purataḥ sthitaḥ. 4. bhagavantaṃ saptakṛt pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato 'ntike cittaṃ prasādayamāno, yena tathāgatas tenāṃjaliṃ praṇāmya, bhagavantam etad avocat:
XXsamghscu:241: [SaSū(C) 60] gato 'smi bhagavan daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu. 2. dṛṣṭāni me bhagavan navānavati koṭīsahasrāṇi buddhakṣetrāṇām ekayā ṛddhyā;
XXsamghscu:243: [SaSū(C) 61] yāvat saptame rātṛdivase tāṃ padmottarāṃ lokadhātum
XXsamghscu:245: tato 'haṃ teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ṛddhiṃ paśyāmi. dvānavatiṣu buddhakṣetrakoṭīśatasahasreṣu tathāgatā dharman deśayanti. 4. aśītiṣu koṭīśatasahasreṣu buddhakṣetreṣu tatraiva divase aśīti koṭīśatasahasrāṇi tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ loka utpannāni. 5. sarvāṃś ca tān
XXsamghscu:246: ahaṃ tathāgatān vanditvā punar eva prakrāntaḥ.
XXsamghscu:247: [SaSū(C) 62] 1. tatraiva divase bhagavann ekonacatvāriṃśad buddhakṣetrakoṭīsahasrāṇy atikramya, sarveṣu ca teṣv ekūnacatvāriṃśatsu buddhakṣetrakoṭīsahasreṣv ekūnacatvāriṃśat koṭīsahasrāṇi bodhisatvānāṃ niṣkramya, tatraiva divase 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ. 2.
XXsamghscu:248: vanditāś ca me bhagavan te tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās; tṛguptaṃ
XXsamghscu:250: [SaSū(C) 63] 1. ṣaṣṭikoṭiṣu bhagavan buddhakṣetreṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyāmi. 2. vanditāni ca me bhagavan tāni buddhakṣetrāṇi, te ca buddhā
XXsamghscu:252: [SaSū(C) 64] śatakoṭīṣu bhagavaṃ buddhakṣetreṣu tathāgatān parinirvāyamāṇān paśyāmi. 2. vanditāś ca me te tathāgatās; tataś cāhaṃ prakrāntaḥ.
XXsamghscu:253: [SaSū(C) 65] 1. dṛṣṭaṃ ca me bhagavann apareṣu paṃcanavatikoṭiṣu
XXsamghscu:254: buddhakṣetreṣu saddharmam antardhāyantaṃ. 2. cintāyāso me bhagavaṃs tatra
XXsamghscu:255: jātaḥ, 3. asrūṇi ca pramuṃcāmi, anyāṃś ca rodamānān bahūn devanāgayakṣarākṣasān kāmarūpinaś ca mahatā śokaśalyena samarpitān
XXsamghscu:256: paśyāmi; 4. evam aparaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ niravaśeṣaṃ dagdhaṃ sasamudraṃ
XXsamghscu:257: sasumeruṃ sapṛthivīpradeśaṃ, tam api bhagavan vanditvā, nirāśībhūtaḥ.
XXsamghscu:258: [SaSū(C) 66] 1. prakrānto 'smi yāvad ahaṃ bhagavan tāṃ padmottarāṃ lokadhātum anuprāptaḥ. 2. tasyāṃ ca bhagavan padmottarāyāṃ lokadhātau paṃca koṭīśatasahasrāṇy āsanānāṃ prajñaptān paśyāmi: 3. dakṣiṇasyān diśi koṭīśatasahasram āsanānāṃ prajñaptān paśyāmi; 4. vāmena pārśvena koṭīśatasahasram āsanānāṃ prajñaptān paśyāmi; 5. pūrvasyān diśi koṭīśatasahasram āsanānāṃ prajñaptān paśyāmi; paścimāyān diśi koṭīśatasahasram āsanānāṃ prajñaptān paśyāmi; 7. ūrdhvāyāṃ diśi koṭīśatasahasram āsanānāṃ prajñaptān paśyāmi.
XXsamghscu:259: [SaSū(C) 67] 1. sarvāṇi ca bhagavan tāny āsanāni saptaratnamayāni; 2.
XXsamghscu:260: sarveṣu ca teṣv āsaneṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā niṣaṇṇā dharman
XXsamghscu:261: deśayanti. 3. tatrāhaṃ bhagavann, āścaryaprāptas, tāṃs tathāgatān paripṛcchāmi: kin nāmeyaṃ bhagavanto lokadhātuḥ? 5. te tathāgatā āhuḥ:
XXsamghscu:263: [SaSū(C) 68] 1. tato 'haṃ bhagavaṃs, tān pradakṣiṇīkṛtya, punar api tāṃs
XXsamghscu:264: tathāgatān paripṛcchāmi: 2. kin nāma iha buddhakṣetre tathāgataḥ? 3. te tathāgatā āhuḥ: padmagarbho nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho ya iha
XXsamghscu:265: buddhakṣetre buddhakṛtyaṃ karoti. 4. tatas tān aham etad avocat: bahūni buddhakoṭīśatasahasrāṇi dṛśyante. tan na jānāmi: katama sa padmagarbho
XXsamghscu:266: nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti. 5. bhagavān āha: ahaṃ te kulaputra darśayiṣyāmi: katamaḥ sa padmagarbho nāma tathāgato 'rhan
XXsamghscu:268: [SaSū(C) 69] 1. atha tatkṣaṇād eva te sarve tathāgatakāyā antardhitāḥ,
XXsamghscu:269: sarve ca bodhisatvarūpāṇi sandṛśyante. 2. ekam eva tathāgataṃ paśyāmi. 3.
XXsamghscu:270: yathāhaṃ tasya tathāgatasya pādau śirasābhivandya purataḥ sthitaḥ, āsanaṃ ca prādurbhūtaṃ. sa ca māṃ tathāgata evam āha: niṣīda kulaputrātra āsane.
XXsamghscu:271: [SaSū(C) 70] 1. athāhaṃ tasminn āsane niṣaṇṇaḥ. 2. tadā ca bhagavann
XXsamghscu:272: anekāny āsanāni prādurbhūtāni, na ca kaścit teṣv āsaneṣu niṣaṇṇaṃ paśyāmi.
XXsamghscu:273: 3. tad ahaṃ tathāgataṃ paripṛcchāmi: na bhagava eṣv āsaneṣu ekaṃ api
XXsamghscu:274: satvaṃ niṣaṇṇaṃ paśyāmi. 4. sa bhagavān mām evam āha: nākṛtakuśalamūlāḥ kulaputra satvā eṣv āsaneṣu śaknuvanti niṣattum. 5. tad ahaṃ taṃ
XXsamghscu:275: tathāgatam idam avocam: kīdṛśaṃ bhagavan satvāḥ kuśalamūlaṃ kṛtvā eṣv
XXsamghscu:276: āsaneṣu niṣīdanti? 6. sa māṃ bhagavann evam āha: śṛṇu kulaputra, ye satvāḥ saṃghāṭaṃ sūtraṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyanti, te tena kuśalamūlena eṣv āsaneṣu niṣatsyante. kaḥ punar vādo ye likhiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti. 7. tvayā sarvaśūra saṃghāṭaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutaṃ yas tvam atrāsane niṣīdita.
XXsamghscu:278: [SaSū(C) 71] 1. evam ukte tena bhagavatā ahaṃ taṃ bhagavantam etad avocat:
XXsamghscu:279: kiyantaṃ bhagavan sa satvaḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyati ya imaṃ saṃghāṭaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyati? 2. atha sa bhagavāṃ padmagarbhas tathāgato 'rhan
XXsamghscu:280: samyaksaṃbuddhas tasyāṃ velāyāṃ smitaṃ praduṣkārṣīt. 3. tad ahaṃ bhagavan
XXsamghscu:281: smitakāraṇaṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ paripṛṣṭavān: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kiṃ kāraṇaṃ yat tathāgataḥ smitaṃ prāduṣkaroti?
XXsamghscu:282: [SaSū(C) 72] 1. sa bhagavān āha: śṛṇu kulaputra sarvaśūra, bodhisatva
XXsamghscu:283: mahāsatva, mahāsthāmaprāpta. 2. tadyathāpināma kulaputra kaścid eva rājā bhavec, cakravarttī caturdvīpeśvaraḥ, sa caturṣu dvīpakṣetreṣu tilaṃ
XXsamghscu:284: vāpayet; 3. sarvaśūra āha: bahūni bhagavan bahūni sugata!
XXsamghscu:285: [SaSū(C) 73] 1. sa bhagavān āha: tataḥ sarvaśūra kaścit satvo bhaved yas
XXsamghscu:286: tāni tilaphalakāny ekarāśiṃ kuryād, anyatarāḥ puruṣas tilaphalarāśer
XXsamghscu:287: ekaikaṃ tilaphalakaṃ gṛhya dvitīye pārśve sthāpayet; tat kiṃ manyase
XXsamghscu:288: sarvaśūra, śaknuyāt sa satvas tāni tilaphalakāni gaṇayituṃ vopamāṃ kartum?
XXsamghscu:289: 2. sarvaśūro bodhisatva āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan, no hīdaṃ sugata! na śakyaṃ tāni tilaphalakāni
XXsamghscu:290: [SaSū(C) 74] 1. bhagavān āha: evam eva sarvaśūrāsya saṃghāṭasūtrasya dharmaparyāyasya yat puṇyaskandhaṃ tan na śakyam anupamyaṃ kartum, anyatra
XXsamghscu:291: tathāgatena. 2. tadyathā: yāvantas te tilaphalakās tāvāntas tathāgatā bhaveyuḥ; te sarve 'sya saṃghāṭasya dharmaparyāyasyanāmaṃparikīrteyeyuḥ,
XXsamghscu:292: śravaṇakuśalamūlapuṇyaṃ ca parikīrtayeyur; na śakyam upamāṃ kartum. 3. kaḥ punar vādo yo likhiṣyati
XXsamghscu:293: [SaSū(C) 75] 1. sarvaśūro bodhisatva āha: kiyantaṃ bhagavan likhataḥ
XXsamghscu:294: puṇyaṃ bhavati ya iman dharmaparyāyaṃ likhayati? 2. bhagavān āha: śṛṇu
XXsamghscu:295: kulaputra, tadyathāpināma kulaputra kaścid eva puruṣo bhaved yas trisāhasramahāsāhasryāṃ lokadhātau tṛṇaṃ vā, taṃ sarvaṃ aṃgulimātraṃ
XXsamghscu:297: [SaSū(C) 76] 1. dvitīyām upamāṃ śṛṇu sarvaśūra: 2. tadyathāpināma yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasryāṃ lokadhātau śilān vā, prapātān, mṛttikān vā,
XXsamghscu:298: paramāṇurajo vā, te sarve rājānaś cakravartino bhaveyuś, caturdvīpeśvarāḥ,
XXsamghscu:299: saptaratnasamanvāgatāḥ; tat kiṃ manyase sarvaśūra, yas teṣāṃ tāvatāṃ
XXsamghscu:300: rājñāṃ cakravartināṃ puṇyaskandho na śakyaṃ tasyopamāṃ kartuṃ sarvasatvair api? 3. sarvaśūro bodhisatva āha: na śakyaṃ bhagavann, anyatra tathāgatāt.
XXsamghscu:301: [SaSū(C) 77] 1. bhagavān āha: evam eva sarvaśūra na śakyaṃ saṃghāṭasūtrasya dharmaparyāyasya likhyamānasya puṇyaskandhopamāṃ kartum.
XXsamghscu:302: 2. yāvantaṃ teṣāṃ rājñāṃ cakravartināṃ puṇyam, ato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ
XXsamghscu:303: prasavati ya ito dharmaparyāyād ekākṣaram api likhitvā sthāpayed;
XXsamghscu:304: bahutaraṃ tasya puṇyaṃ vadāmi, na tv eva teṣāṃ rājñāṃ cakravartināṃ.
XXsamghscu:305: [SaSū(C) 78] 1. evam eva sarvaśūra, bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya mahāyānasaddharmadhārakasya pratipattisthitasya, yat puṇyaṃ tan na śakyaṃ rājabhiś cakravartibhir abhibhavituṃ. 2. evam evāsya saṃghāṭasya
XXsamghscu:306: dharmaparyāyasya lekhanād, yat puṇyaṃ, tan na śakyam upamāṃ kartuṃ. 3.
XXsamghscu:307: imaṃ sarvaśūra saṃghāṭaṃ sūtraṃ puṇyanidhānāni darśayati; 4. sarvakleśān
XXsamghscu:308: upaśamayati; 5. sarvadharmolkāṃ jvālayati; 6. sarvamārān pāpīmataḥ parājayati; 7. sarvabodhisatvabhavanāny ujvālayati; 8. sarvadharmanirhārān
XXsamghscu:310: [SaSū(C) 79] 1. evam ukte sarvaśūro bodhisatvo mahāsatvo bhagavantam etad
XXsamghscu:311: avocat: iha bhagavan brahmacaryaṃ paramaduṣkaracaryā. 2. tat kasya hetoḥ?
XXsamghscu:312: durlabhā bhagavaṃs tathāgatacaryā, evam eva durlabhā brahmacaryā. 3. yadā ca brahmacaryaṃ cariṣyati tadā tathāgataṃ saṃmukhaṃ drakṣyati, rātṛndivaṃ ca tathāgatadarśanaṃ bhaviṣyati; 4. yadā ca tathāgataṃ paśyati tadā buddhakṣetraṃ paśyati; 5. yadā buddhakṣetraṃ paśyati tadā sarvadharmanidhānāni paśyati; 6. yadā sarvadharmanidhānāni paśyati tadāsya maraṇakālasamaye trāsaṃ notpadyate; 7. na sa jātu mātuḥ kukṣāv upapatsyate; 8. na tasya jātu śoko bhaviṣyati; 9. na ca tṛṣṇāpāśena baddho
XXsamghscu:314: [SaSū(C) 80] 1. evam ukte bhagavān sarvaśūraṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam etad
XXsamghscu:315: avocat: durlabhaḥ sarvaśūra tathāgatānām utpādaḥ? 2. āha: durlabho bhagavan durlabhaḥ sugata! 3. bhagavān āha: evam eva sarvaśūra durlabho
XXsamghscu:316: 'yaṃ saṃghāto dharmaparyāyaḥ. 4. yeṣāṃ khalu punaḥ sarvaśūrāyaṃ saṃghāṭo dharmaparyāyaḥ śrotrāvabhāsam āgamiṣyati, so 'śīti kalpāṃ jātyā jātismaro
XXsamghscu:318: aṣṭau kalpasahasrāṇi śakratvaṃ pratilapsyate; 7. paṃcaviṃśatiḥ kalpasahasrāṇi śuddhāvāsakāyikānān devānāṃ sahabhāvyatāyām upapatsyate; 8.
XXsamghscu:321: kalpaśatasahasraṃ preteṣu nopapatsyate; 3. aṣṭāviṃśati kalpasahasrāṇi tiryakṣur nopapatsyate; 4. trayodaśa kalpasahasrāṇy asurakāyikeṣu
XXsamghscu:322: nopapatsyate; 5. na śastreṇa kālaṃ kariṣyati, na viṣeṇa, nāgninā; 6. na cāsya paropakramabhayaṃ
XXsamghscu:324: sapta kalpasahasrāṇi prajñācarito bhaviṣyati; 3. nava kalpasahasrāṇi prāsādiko bhaviṣyati, darśanīyaḥ; yathā tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyarūpakāyapariniṣpattis tathā tasya bhaviṣyati; 4.
XXsamghscu:325: paṃcadaśa kalpasahasrāṇi na strībhāveṣūpapatsyate; 5. ṣoḍaśa kalpasahasrāṇi vyādhiḥ kāye nākramiṣyati; 6. paṃcatṛṃśat kalpasahasrāṇi divyacakṣur bhaviṣyati;
XXsamghscu:326: [SaSū(C) 83] 1. ekonaviṃśat kalpasahasrāṇi nāgayoniṣu nopapatsyate; 2. ṣaṭ kalpasahasrāṇi na krodhābhibhūto bhaviṣyati; 3. sapta kalpasahasrāṇi daridrakuleṣu nopapatsyate; 4. aśītiḥ kalpasahasrāṇi dvau dvīpau
XXsamghscu:327: paribhuṃkte; 5. yadā daridro bhavati tadā īdṛśaṃ sukhaṃ pratilapsyate: 6.
XXsamghscu:328: dvādaśa kalpasahasrāṇi andhayoniṣu nopapatsyate; 7. trayodaśa kalpasahasrāṇi apāyeṣu nopapatsyate; 8. ekādaśa kalpasahasrāṇi kṣāntivādī
XXsamghscu:329: bhaviṣyati; 9. maraṇakālasamaye carimavijñānanirodhe vartamāne, na viparītasaṃjñī bhaviṣyati; 10. na ca krodhābhibhūto bhaviṣyati;
XXsamghscu:330: [SaSū(C) 84] 1. sa pūrvasyān diśi dvādaśagaṃgānadībālikāsamān buddhān bhagavataḥ saṃmukhan drakṣyati; 2. dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi viṃśati buddhakoṭī saṃmukhan drakṣyati; 3. paścimasyān diśi paṃcaviṃśatigaṃgānadībālikāsamān
XXsamghscu:331: buddhān bhagavataḥ saṃmukhaṃ drakṣyati; 4. uttarasyān diśi viṃśatigaṃgānadībālikāsamān buddhāṃ bhagavataḥ saṃmukhaṃ drakṣyati; 5.
XXsamghscu:332: ūrdhvāyāṃ diśi navati koṭīsahasrāṇi buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ saṃmukhaṃ
XXsamghscu:333: drakṣyati; 6. adhastāddiśi koṭīśataṃ gaṃgānadībālikāsamān buddhān bhagavataḥ saṃmukhan drakṣyati;
XXsamghscu:334: [SaSū(C) 85] 1. te ca sarve tathāgatās taṃ kulaputram āśvāsayanti: mā bhaiḥ kulaputra, tava, saṃghāṭaṃ sūtran dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā, iyantaḥ sāṃparāyikāni guṇāni sukhāni ca bhaviṣyanti! 2. paśyasi tvaṃ bhoḥ
XXsamghscu:336: tathāgatakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi? 3. āha: paśyāmi bhagavan paśyāmi sugata.
XXsamghscu:337: 4. bhagavān āha: ete bhoḥ kulaputra tathāgatās tava sakāśam upasaṃkrāntā
XXsamghscu:339: [SaSū(C) 86] 1. āha: śṛṇu kulaputra, tvayā mānuṣyakam ātmabhāvaṃ
XXsamghscu:340: pratilabhya saṃghāṭaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrotrāvabhāsam āgataṃ; tena tvayā etāvat puṇyaskandhaṃ prasūtaṃ. 2. āha: yadi mama bhagavann etāvān
XXsamghscu:341: puṇyaskandhaḥ, kaḥ punar vādo yaḥ sakalasamāptaṃ śroṣyati!
XXsamghscu:342: [SaSū(C) 87] 1. āhā: alam bhoḥ kulaputra! catuṣpadikāyā gāthāyāḥ śrutāyāḥ
XXsamghscu:343: puṇyaṃ varṇayāmi. 2. tadyathā kulaputra, trayodaśagaṃgānadībālikāsamānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ yaḥ puṇyaskandhas, tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati yaś catuṣpadikām api gāthām ito dharmaparyāyāc chroṣyati; 3. yaś ca trayodaśagaṃgānadībālikāsamāṃs tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān pūjayati, yaś cetaḥ saṃghāṭād dharmaparyāyād antaśaś catuṣpādikām api gāthāṃ śroṣyati, ayaṃ tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ
XXsamghscu:344: prasaviṣyati. 4. kaḥ punar vādo yaḥ sakalasamāptaṃ śroṣyati!
XXsamghscu:345: [SaSū(C) 88] 1. śṛṇu kulaputra, yaś cemaṃ saṃghāṭaṃ sūtraṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sakalasamāptaṃ śroṣyati tasya kiyantaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyati. 2.
XXsamghscu:346: tadyathāpināma kaścid eva puruṣaḥ eva puruṣaḥ sarvasyāṃ tṛsāhasramahāsāhasryāṃ lokadhātau tilaṃ vāpayed; yāvantas te tilaphalakās
XXsamghscu:347: tāvanto rājānaś cakravartino bhaveyur; atha kaścid eva puruṣo bhaved āḍhayo mahābhogaḥ; 3. atha khalu sa puruṣas teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ rājñāṃ cakravartināṃ dānan dadyāt; yaś caikasya srotaāpannasya dānam dadyād, ayaṃ tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati.
XXsamghscu:348: [SaSū(C) 89] 1. ye trisāhasramahāsāhasryāṃ lokadhātau satvās te sarve
XXsamghscu:349: srotaāpanā bhaveyus, teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ dānan dadato yat puṇyaskandhaṃ, ayaṃ tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati ya ekasya sakṛdāgāmino dānan
XXsamghscu:350: dadyād. 2. ye trisāhasramahāsāhasryāṃ lokadhātau satvās te sarve
XXsamghscu:351: sakṛdāgāmino bhaveyuḥ, teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ dānan dadato yaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ, ayan tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati ya ekasyānāgāmino dānān dadyād. 3.
XXsamghscu:352: ye trisāhasramahāsāhasryāṃ lokadhātau satvās te sarve 'nāgāmino bhaveyuḥ,
XXsamghscu:353: teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ dānan dadato yaḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ, ayaṃ tato bahutaraṃ
XXsamghscu:354: puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati ya ekasyārhato dānan dadyād. 4. ye trisāhasramahāsāhasryāṃ lokadhātau satvās te sarve 'rhanto bhaveyuḥ, teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ dānan dadato yaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ, ayaṃ tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati ya ekasya pratyekabuddhasya dānan dadyād. 5. ye trisāhasramahāsāhasryāṃ lokadhātau satvās te sarve pratyekabuddhā
XXsamghscu:355: bhaveyus, teṣān sarveṣāṃ dānan dadato yaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ ayaṃ tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati ya ekasya bodhisatvasya dānan dadyād. 6.
XXsamghscu:356: ye trisāhasramahāsāhasryāṃ lokadhātau satvās te sarve bodhisatvā bhaveyus,
XXsamghscu:357: teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ dānan dadato yaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ, ayaṃ tato bahutaraṃ
XXsamghscu:358: puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati ya ekasya tathāgatasya cittaṃ prasādayed.
XXsamghscu:359: [SaSū(C) 90] 1. yaś ca trisāhasramahāsāhasryāṃ lokadhātau tathāgataparipūrṇāyāṃ cittaṃ prasādayed, ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyati ya imaṃ saṃghāṭasūtraṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyati.
XXsamghscu:360: 2. kaḥ punar vādaḥ sarvaśūra ya iman dharmaparyāyaṃ likhiṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati. 3. kaḥ punar vādaḥ sarvaśūra ya imaṃ saṃghāṭasūtraṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ cittaprasādena namaskariṣyati.
XXsamghscu:361: [SaSū(C) 91] 1. tat kiṃ manyase sarvaśūra? śakyam idaṃ sūtraṃ
XXsamghscu:362: bālapṛthagjanaiḥ śrotuṃ? 2. ye ca śroṣyanti na ca prasādam utpādayiṣyanti.
XXsamghscu:363: 3. śṛṇu sarvaśūra, santi kecit sarvaśūra bālapṛthagjanāḥ satvāḥ ye
XXsamghscu:364: śaknuyur mahāsamudre gādhaṃ labdhum? 4. āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan!
XXsamghscu:365: [SaSū(C) 92] 1. bhagavān āha: asti punaḥ sarvaśūra kaścit satvo ya
XXsamghscu:366: ekapāṇitalena samudraṃ kṣapayed? 2. āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan, no hīdaṃ sugata! 3. bhagavān āha: yathā sarvaśūra nāsti sa kaścit satvo yaḥ śaknuyād ekapāṇitalena mahāsamudraṃ śoṣayituṃ, evam eva sarvaśūra ye hīnādhimuktikāḥ satvāḥ na śakyaṃ tair ayan dharmaparyāyaḥ śrotuṃ. 4. yaiḥ sarvaśūrāśītir gaṃgānadībālikāsamāni tathāgatakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi na dṛṣṭāni, na taiḥ śakyam ayaṃ saṃghāṭaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ likhituṃ. 5. yair navatigaṃgānadībālikāsamāni tathāgatāni na dṛṣṭāni, na taiḥ śakyam ayan dharmaparyāyaḥ śrotum.
XXsamghscu:367: [SaSū(C) 93] yena tathāgatakoṭīśatasahasrāṇi na dṛṣṭāni, ta iman dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā pratikṣipanti. 2. yaiḥ sarvaśūragaṃgānadībālikāsamānitathāgatakoṭīśatāni dṛṣṭāni, ta iman dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā prasādacittam utpādayanti, harṣayanti, yathābhūtaṃ
XXsamghscu:368: prajānanti. 3. ya imaṃ saṃghāṭaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ yathābhūtaṃ śraddadhanti
XXsamghscu:370: [SaSū(C) 94] 1. śṛṇu sarvaśūra, ye kecid asmāt saṃghāṭād dharmaparyāyād ekām api catuṣpadikāṃ gāthāṃ likhiṣyanti teṣāṃ sarvaśūra satvānāṃ, tataḥ paścāt paṃcanavati koṭīsahasrāni lokadhātūnām atikramya yathā
XXsamghscu:371: sukhāvatīlokadhātus, tathā teṣāṃ buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati; 2. teṣāṃ ca sarvaśūra satvānāṃ caturaśītiḥ kalpasahasrāṇy āyuṣpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati.
XXsamghscu:372: [SaSū(C) 95] 1. śṛṇu sarvaśūra, ye bodhisatvā mahāsatvā asmāt saṃghāṭād dharmaparyāyād antaśaś catuṣpadikām api gāthāṃ śroṣyanti. 2. tadyathā sarvaśūra kaścit satvo bhaved yaḥ paṃcānantaryāṇi karmāṇi kuryāt, kārayed
XXsamghscu:373: vā, kriyamāṇāni vānumodet, sa itaḥ saṃghāṭād dharmaparyāyāc catuṣpadikām api gāthāṃ śṛṇuyāt, tasya tāni paṃcānantaryāṇi karmāṇi parikṣayaṃ gaccheyuḥ.
XXsamghscu:374: [SaSū(C) 96] 1. śṛṇu sarvaśūra, punar aparaṃ guṇam āmantrayāmi: 2.
XXsamghscu:375: tadyathāpināma kaścit satvo bhaved yaḥ stūpabhedaṃ kārayet, saṃghabhedaṃ
XXsamghscu:376: ca, 3. bodhisatvaṃ samādher uccālayet, 4. buddhajñānasyāntarāyaṃ kuryāt,
XXsamghscu:378: 6. atha sa satvaḥ paścāt paridevati, śocati: naṣṭo 'ham anena kāyena,
XXsamghscu:379: naṣṭaṃ me paralokam iti, kalpam evāhaṃ naṣṭaḥ. 7. tato 'sya mahācintāyāsaṃ
XXsamghscu:380: bhaveta, duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayeta, kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ vedayeta; 8. tasya sarvaśūra satvasya sarvasatvāḥ parivarjayanti, jugupsanti ca: 9. dagdho naṣṭa eṣa satva, laukikalokottarād dharmā naṣṭo 'nekāni kalpāni, yathā
XXsamghscu:382: [SaSū(C) 97] 1. evam evāyaṃ puruṣaḥ: yathā sucitraṃ gṛhaṃ dagdhasthūṇaṃ na śobhate, evam evāyaṃ sa puruṣa iha loke na śobhate; 2. yatra yatra ca
XXsamghscu:383: gacchati tatra tatra satvaiḥ paribhāṣyate, praharanti ca; 3.
XXsamghscu:384: kṣutpipāsārdito 'pi na kiṃcil labhate; 4. tato duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayati.
XXsamghscu:386: stūpabhedaṃ ca, paṃcānantaryāṇi ca karmāṇi samanusmarati; 2. sa tato duḥkhān nirvedacittam utpādayati: kutrāhaṃ yāsyāmi, ko me trāta
XXsamghscu:388: [SaSū(C) 99] 1. sa evaṃ cintayati: gamiṣyāmy ahaṃ parvatagirikandareṣu,
XXsamghscu:389: praviśāmi, tatra me kālakriyā bhaviṣyati, na ca me iha kaścit trātāsti.
XXsamghscu:391: (1) kṛtaṃ me pāpakaṃ karma dagdhasthūṇaṃ nirantaram /
XXsamghscu:392: nemaṃ loke śobhayiṣye na śobhayiṣyāmi paratra ca /
XXsamghscu:393: antargṛhe na śobhāmi na śobhāmi ca bāhire //
XXsamghscu:394: (2) doṣahetoḥ kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tena yāsyāmi durgatim /
XXsamghscu:395: paratra duḥkhitaḥ kutra vasiṣyāmi ha durgatau //
XXsamghscu:399: (4) mūḍho 'si gaccha puruṣa maivaṃ cintaya duḥkhitaḥ /
XXsamghscu:400: śaraṇo na ca me trāṇaṃ duḥkhāṃ vindāmi vedanām //
XXsamghscu:401: (5) mātṛghāṭaṃ pitṛghāṭaṃ paṃcānantaryāñ ca me kṛtam /
XXsamghscu:402: parvate mūrdhni gacchāmi tata ātmāṃ tyajāmy aham //
XXsamghscu:403: (6) mā gaccha mūḍhapuruṣa karma mā kuru pāpakaṃ /
XXsamghscu:404: bahu tvayā kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ vyāpannena hi cetasā //
XXsamghscu:405: (7) kurvanti ye ātmaghātaṃ narakaṃ yānti duḥkhitāḥ /
XXsamghscu:407: (8) na tena vīryeṇa bhavanti buddhā bhavanti naivāpi ca bodhisatvā //
XXsamghscu:408: na śrāvakaṃ labhyati mokṣayānam anyasya vīryasya kuruṣva yatnam //
XXsamghscu:409: (9) gacchasva taṃ parvatu yena so ṛṣi gatvā ca taṃ dṛṣṭva ṛṣiṃ mahātmā /
XXsamghscu:410: vanditva pādau śirasā ca tasya trāṇaṃ bhavāhī mama agrasatva //
XXsamghscu:411: (10) deśehi dharmaṃ kuśalaṃ muhūrttam bhīto 'smi trasto atiduḥkhapīḍitaḥ /
XXsamghscu:412: ṛṣir vadantaṃ śṛṇu satvasāra niṣadya cittasya kṣaṇaṃ kuruṣva //
XXsamghscu:413: (11) bhītaḥ sa trasto atiduḥkhapīḍitas tato niṣaṇṇaḥ kṣaṇiko muhūrtam /
XXsamghscu:414: deśemi pāpaṃ kṛta yan mayā bahū ṛṣir hi vācam idam abravīti //
XXsamghscu:416: (12) bhuṃjāhi taṃ bhojanu yad dadāmi duḥkhena ca krandasi śokapīḍitaḥ /
XXsamghscu:417: kṣudhā pipāsāya ca pīḍitas tvaṃ nirāśakaś ca tribhavād bhaviṣyasi //
XXsamghscu:419: mṛṣṭaṃ bhuṃja manāpaṃ ca śarīre tarpaṇārthikaṃ //
XXsamghscu:421: tasya tad bhojanaṃ mṛṣṭaṃ muhūrtaṃ bhuktavān asau //
XXsamghscu:422: (15) bhuktvā hastau ca prakṣālya kṛtvā pradakṣiṇaṃ ṛṣiṃ /
XXsamghscu:423: paryaṃkena niṣīditvā vada yat pāpakaṃ kṛtam //
XXsamghscu:426: (17) tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā ṛṣir vākyam athābravīt /
XXsamghscu:427: asādhus tava bho puruṣa yat kṛtaṃ pāpakaṃ tvayā /
XXsamghscu:428: deśehi pāpakaṃ karma kṛtaṃ kārāpitaṃ ca yat //
XXsamghscu:429: 5. atha khalu tasmin kāle sa puruṣaḥ śokaśalyasamarpito, bhītas, trasta,
XXsamghscu:431: (18) kṛtaṃ me pāpakaṃ karma duḥkhāṃ vetsyāmi vedanāṃ /
XXsamghscu:432: ko me syāt trāyako nātho yo me duḥkhāt pramocayet //
XXsamghscu:433: 6. atha khalu sa puruṣas tasya ṛṣer jānudvayaṃ bhūmau nipātyāha ca:
XXsamghscu:434: (19) deśeyaṃ pāpakaṃ karma yat kṛtaṃ kāritaṃ mayā /
XXsamghscu:435: mā phalaṃ pāpakaṃ bhotu mā me syād duḥkhavedanā //
XXsamghscu:436: (20) ṛṣis trāṇaṃ bhaven mahyam āsanno 'haṃ bhaven tava /
XXsamghscu:438: [SaSū(C) 100] 1. atha khalu sa riṣis tena kālena tena samayena taṃ puruṣam etad avocat, evaṃ cāśvāsayati: 2. mā bhaiḥ puruṣa, ahaṃ te trāṇaṃ
XXsamghscu:439: bhaviṣyāmy, ahan te gatir, ahaṃ parāyaṇaṃ bhaviṣyāmi; 3. saṃmukhaṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇu. śrutaṃ tvayā kiṃcit saṃghāṭaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ? 4. sa āha: na me kadācic chrutaṃ. 5. ṛṣir āha: ko 'gnidagdhasya satvasya dharman deśayaty
XXsamghscu:440: anyatra yaḥ karuṇāvihāritayā satvānāṃ dharman deśayati? 6. āha: śṛṇu
XXsamghscu:443: yadāsīt tena kālena tena samayena, vimalacandro nāma rājābhūd, dhārmiko,
XXsamghscu:444: dharmarājā. 2. tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputra rājño vimalacandrasya gṛhe putro jātaḥ.
XXsamghscu:445: [SaSū(C) 102] 1. atha sa rājā vimalacandro lakṣaṇanaimittikāṃ chāstrapāṭhakān brāhmaṇān sannipātyaivam āha: 2. kiṃ brāhmaṇāḥ kumārasya
XXsamghscu:446: nimittaṃ paśyatha, śobhanam aśobhanaṃ veti? 3. atha naimittikā brāhmaṇāḥ
XXsamghscu:447: kathayaty: asādhur ayaṃ mahārāja kumāro jātaḥ, asādhur iti. 4. rājā śrutvā sasaṃbhramaṃ papraccha: kimidaṃ brāhmaṇā? 5. naimittikāḥ kathayanty: ayaṃ deva rājakumāro yadi sapta varṣāṇi jīvati sa eṣa mātāpitaraṃ jīvitād vyāvaropayiṣyati. 6. tato sa rājā evam āha: varaṃ me jīvitāntarāyo bhavatu mā cāhaṃ putraṃ vadheyaṃ. 7. tat kasmāt? kadācit karhacil loke
XXsamghscu:448: manuṣyotpādaṃ labhyate. 8. nāhaṃ tathā kariṣyāmi yad imaṃ mānuṣyakaṃ kāyaṃ
XXsamghscu:450: [SaSū(C) 103] 1. atha sa kumāro vardhate: yad anye varṣadvayena vardhante tadāsāv ekena māsena vardhate; 2. jānāti ca sa rājā vimalacandro: 'yaṃ
XXsamghscu:451: kumāro mama karmopacayena vardhate. 3. tato rājā tasya kumārasya paṭṭam ābandhyaivam āha: tava rājyaṃ bhavatu, vipulā ca kīrti, rājyabhogaiśvaryaṃ ca kāraya dharmeṇa, mā adharmeṇa. 4. tataḥ paṭṭaṃ badhvā, rājeti nāmadheyam akarot. 5. sa ca rājā vimalacandro na bhūyaḥ svaviṣaye rājyaṃ kārayaty.
XXsamghscu:452: [SaSū(C) 104] 1. atha te triṃśad amātyakoṭyo, yena sa rājā vimalacandras
XXsamghscu:453: tenopasaṃkrāntā, upetya, taṃ rājānaṃ vimalacandram evam āhuḥ: kasmāt tvaṃ bhoḥ mahārāja svaviṣaye na bhūyo rājyaṃ kārayasi? 2. rājāha: bahūny asaṃkhyeyāni kalpāni, yan mayā rājyabhogaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kāritaṃ, na ca me kadācid viṣayeṣu tṛptir āsīt. 3. tena ca kālena tena samayena na cireṇa kālāntareṇa sa putras taṃ mātāpitaraṃ jīvitād vyavaropayati, 4. tena ca tatra paṃcānantaryāṇi karmāny upacitāni. 5. ahaṃ ca bhoḥ puruṣa tāvac ciraṃ kālasamayam anusmarāmi yathādya śvo vā.
XXsamghscu:454: [SaSū(C) 105] 1. yadā tasya rājño duḥkhā vedanā utpannā tadā sa rājā
XXsamghscu:455: vipratisārībhūto 'śrukaṇṭhaḥ paridevati: pāpaṃ me karma kṛtam iti! avīcau mahānarake duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ pratyanubhaviṣyāmīti! 2. tato 'haṃ
XXsamghscu:456: kāruṇyacittam utpādya tatra gatvā tasya rājño dharman deśayitavān; 3. atha sa rājā taṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā tasya tāni paṃcānantaryāṇi karmāṇi kṣipraṃ niravaśeṣaṃ parikṣayaṃ gatāni. āha:
XXsamghscu:458: ye śroṣyanti iman dharman padaṃ prāpsyanty anuttaram //
XXsamghscu:460: śṛṇu dharmaṃ pravakṣyāmi yena kṣipraṃ vimokṣase //
XXsamghscu:469: [SaSū(C) 106] 1. atha khalu tena kālena tena samayenopary antarikṣe sthitāni dvādaśa devaputrasahasrāṇi kṛtāṃjalipuṭāni, tam ṛṣim upagamya,
XXsamghscu:470: pādau śirasā praṇamya, evam āhuḥ: bhagavan, kevac ciraṃ smarasi mahātapa?
XXsamghscu:471: 2. evaṃ catvāraḥ koṭīr nāgarājñām āgatya, aṣṭādaśa koṭīsahasrāṇi yakṣarājñām āgatya, yena sa ṛṣis tenāṃjaliṃ praṇāmya, evam āhuḥ: kevac ciraṃ smarasi?
XXsamghscu:472: [SaSū(C) 107] 1. mahātmā ṛṣir āha: śatam asaṃkhyeyakalpakoṭīnayutasahasrāṇi samanusmarāmi. 2. āhu: kena kuśalakarmaṇā muhūrtamātreṇaivaṃ pāpaṃ karma praśāntam? 3. āha: saṃghāṭaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā, anena kuśalakarmaṇā sarvapāpakarma praśāntam;
XXsamghscu:473: [SaSū(C) 108] 1. ye ca tatra satvāḥ sannipatitāḥ, yair imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ
XXsamghscu:474: śrutvā śraddadhānatā vā kṛtā, te sarve vyākriyante 'nuttarāyāṃ
XXsamghscu:475: samyaksaṃbodhau; 2. yena ca puruṣeṇa tāni paṃcānantaryāṇi karmāṇi kṛtāni,
XXsamghscu:476: tenemaṃ saṃghāṭaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā muhūrtamātreṇa tāni paṃcānantaryāṇi karmāṇi niravaśeṣaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ kṛtāṇi; 3.
XXsamghscu:478: bhavanti; 4. dvātriṃśad devalokadvārāṇy apāvṛtāni bhavanti; 5. ya itaḥ saṃghāṭād dharmaparyāyād antaśaś catuṣpadikām api gāthāṃ śroṣyati,
XXsamghscu:479: tasyetādṛśāni kuśalamūlāni bhaviṣyanti; 6. kaḥ punar vādo yaḥ saṃghāṭasūtraṃ satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati
XXsamghscu:480: puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhirvādyāṃjalikarmapraṇāmaṃ vā kariṣyati, ekāṃ vārāṃ anumodiṣyaty, evaṃ ca vakṣyati: sādhu subhāṣitam iti!
XXsamghscu:481: [SaSū(C) 109] 1. atha khalu sarvaśūro bodhisatvo mahāsatvo bhagavantam
XXsamghscu:482: etad avocat: kiyantaṃ bhagavann añjalipraṇāmāt puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati ye
XXsamghscu:483: te saṃghāṭaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣyamāṇaṃ śrutvāñjaliṃ kṛtvā praṇamanti? 2.
XXsamghscu:484: bhagavān āha: śṛṇu kulaputra, yena paṃcānantaryāṇi karmāṇi kṛtāṇi,
XXsamghscu:485: kāritāni, kriyamāṇāni vānumoditāni, yadi sa itaḥ saṃghāṭād dharmaparyāyād antaśaś catuṣpadikām api gāthāṃ śrutvāñjaliṃ praṇāmayiṣyati, tasya tāni sarvāṇi paṃcānantaryāṇi karmāṇi kṣayaṃ gatāni bhaviṣyanti; 3. kaḥ punar vādaḥ sarvaśūra yaḥ sakalasamāptam evāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyaty: ayaṃ tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyati.
XXsamghscu:486: [SaSū(C) 110] 1. upamāṃ te kulaputra kariṣyāmi asya saṃghāṭasūtrārthasya
XXsamghscu:487: vijñaptaye: 2. tadyathāpināma sarvaśūrānavataptasya nāgarājasya bhavane na kadācit sūryo 'vabhāsayati, tataś ca paṃca mahānadyaḥ pravahanti. atha kaścid eva puruṣo bhaved yas tāsāṃ paṃcānāṃ mahānadīnām udakasya bindūni gaṇayet. 4. tat kiṃ manyase sarvaśūra, śakyaṃ teṣām udakavindunāṃ
XXsamghscu:488: gaṇanāyogena paryantam adhigantum? 5. āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan, no hīdaṃ sugata! 6. bhagavān āha: evam eva sarvaśūra na śakyaṃ saṃghāṭasūtrasya
XXsamghscu:489: dharmaparyāyasya kuśalamūlaṃ, kalpena vā, kalpaśatena vā, kalpasahasreṇa
XXsamghscu:490: vā, kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṇa vā, gaṇanayā paryantam adhigantuṃ.
XXsamghscu:491: [SaSū(C) 111] 1. tat kiṃ manyase sarvaśūra, duṣkaraṃ tasya ya imaṃ saṃghāṭaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ muhūrtaṃ prakāśayeta? 2. āha: duṣkaraṃ bhagavaṃ!
XXsamghscu:492: 3. bhagavān āha: ataḥ suduṣkarataraṃ sarvaśūra tasya ya imaṃ saṃghāṭaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śakṣyati
XXsamghscu:493: [SaSū(C) 112] 1. tadyathā anavataptāt paṃca mahānadyaḥ pravahanti, tāsāṃ paṃcānāṃ mahānadīnāṃ pravahantīnām udakavindūn na śakyaṃ gaṇanayā paryantam adhigantum, evam evāsya dharmaparyāyasya puṇyaskandhasya na śakyaṃ paryantam adhigantum. sarvaśūra āha: katamās tā bhagavan paṃca
XXsamghscu:494: mahānadyaḥ? 3. bhagavān āha: tadyathā: gaṃgā, sītā, vakṣur, yamunā,
XXsamghscu:495: candrabhāgā ca. 4. imā sarvaśūra paṃca mahānadyo mahāsamudre praviśanti;
XXsamghscu:497: [SaSū(C) 113] 1. punar aparaṃ sarvaśūra, paṃcemā mahānadyaḥ ākāśe
XXsamghscu:498: pravahanti yā prajāṃ prahlādayanti; 2. tāś ca paṃca mahānadyaḥ ekaikā sahasraparivārāḥ. 3. āha: katamās tā bhagavan paṃca mahānadyaḥ sahasrāparivārāḥ? 4. bhagavān āha: sundarī nāma nadī sahasraparivārā,
XXsamghscu:499: śaṃkhā nāma nadī sahasraparivārā, vahantī nāma nadī sahasraparivārā,
XXsamghscu:500: citrasenā nāma nadī sahasraparivārā, dharmavṛttā nāma nadī
XXsamghscu:501: sahasraparivārā. 5. imās tā sarvaśūra paṃca mahānadyaḥ sahasraparivārā yā jaṃbudvīpe autsukyam āpadyante, yāḥ kālena kālaṃ jaṃbudvīpe bindubhir varṣadhārāḥ pramuṃcanti; 6. tena puṣpaphalasasyāny abhiruhyanti. 7. yadā jaṃbudvīpe varṣadhārāḥ prapatanti, tadā udakaṃ jāyate, jātaṃ codakaṃ,
XXsamghscu:503: [SaSū(C) 114] 1. tadyathāpināma sarvaśūra prajāpati sarvajaṃbudvīpe sukhaṃ kārayati, evam eva sarvaśūrāyaṃ saṃghāṭo dharmaparyāya bahujanahitāya
XXsamghscu:504: jaṃbudvīpe prakāśitaḥ. 2. yathā devānāṃ trāyastriṃśatāṃ āyuṣpramāṇaṃ na tathā manuṣyāṇāṃ. 3. katame sarvaśūra trāyastriṃśā devā yatra śakro
XXsamghscu:505: devānām indraḥ prativasati. 4. te trāyastriṃśā nāma devāḥ santi tadyathā
XXsamghscu:506: sarvaśūra satvā ye vāksucaritaṃ bhāṣante. 5. teṣāṃ na śakyaṃ
XXsamghscu:508: [SaSū(C) 115] 1. santi sarvaśūra satvā ye vāgduścaritaṃ bhāṣante; 2. na śakyaṃ teṣām apuṇyaskandhasyopamāṃ kartum yat te satvāḥ narakatiryakpretaduḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayanti; 3. na ca kaścit teṣāṃ trātā bhavati; tatra te nirāśāḥ paridevante narakeṣu prapatamānāḥ; 4. tad akalyāṇamitravaśena draṣṭavyaṃ. 5. ye satvā vāksucaritaṃ bhāṣante teṣāṃ na
XXsamghscu:509: śakyaṃ puṇyaskandhasyopamāṃ kartuṃ; 6. tat kalyāṇamitravaśena draṣṭavyaṃ.
XXsamghscu:510: [SaSū(C) 116] 1. yadā kalyāṇamitraṃ paśyati, tadā tathāgato dṛṣṭo bhavati;
XXsamghscu:511: 2. yadā tathāgataṃ paśyati, tadā tasya sarvapāpakṣayo bhavati; 3. yadā sarvapāpakṣayo bhavati, tadā prajāpatir jaṃbudvīpe autsukyaṃ karoti; 4.
XXsamghscu:512: yadā prajāpatir jaṃbudvīpe autsukyaṃ karoti, tadā jaṃbudvīpakānāṃ satvānāṃ
XXsamghscu:513: sukhasya na śakyam upamāṃ kartum. 5. evam evāyaṃ sarvaśūra saṃghāṭo dharmaparyāyo jaṃbudvīpe buddhakṛtyaṃ karoti; 6. tadā na śakyaṃ teṣāṃ satvānāṃ puṇyaskandhasyopamāṃ kartum.
XXsamghscu:515: saṃbhedaṃ samavasaraṇaṃ gacchanti, tatra na śakyam udakasya pramāṇam udgrahītuṃ, etāvad udakakuṃbhā vā, udakakuṃbhaśatāni vā,
XXsamghscu:516: udakakuṃbhasahasrāṇi vā, udakakuṃbhaśatasahasrāṇi vā. api tu bahutvād
XXsamghscu:517: udakasya mahān udakaskandha: iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati.
XXsamghscu:518: [SaSū(C) 118] evam eva sarvaśūra yadā jaṃbudvīpakā satvā imaṃ saṃghāṭaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyanti, śrutvā codgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti,
XXsamghscu:519: vācayiṣyanti, paryavāpsyanti, pareṣāṃ ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyanti,
XXsamghscu:520: pratipattyā ca saṃpādayiṣyanti, tadā na śakyaṃ teṣāṃ satvānāṃ puṇyaskandhasya pramāṇaṃ udgrahītum. api tu bahutvāt puṇyasya mahān puṇyaskandha: iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati.
XXsamghscu:521: [SaSū(C) 119] 1. ye sarvaśūra satvāḥ saṃghāṭaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ na
XXsamghscu:522: śroṣyanti, na taiḥ śakyam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhum; 2. na śakyaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartayitum; 3. na śakyaṃ dharmagaṇḍī parāhanitum;
XXsamghscu:523: 4. na śakyaṃ tair dharmasiṃhāsanam abhiroḍhuṃ; 5. na śakyaṃ nirvāṇadhātum
XXsamghscu:524: anupraveṣṭuṃ; 6. na śakyam aprameyai raśmibhir avabhāsayitum; 7. ya imaṃ sarvaśūra saṃghāṭaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ na śroṣyanti, na śakyaṃ tair bodhimaṇḍe
XXsamghscu:526: [SaSū(C) 120] 1. sarvaśūra āha: pṛcchāmi bhagavaṃ, pṛcchāmi sugata kaṃcid
XXsamghscu:527: eva kautuhalam. 2. bhagavān āha: pṛccha tvaṃ sarvaśūra, yad yad evākāṃkṣasy ahaṃ te niṣkāṃkṣaṃ kariṣyāmi. 3. sarvaśūra āha: katamaḥ sa bhagavan ṛṣir abhūd yena te satvāḥ paṃcabhir ānantaryaiḥ karmabhiḥ
XXsamghscu:528: parimokṣitāḥ, avaivartikabhūmau ca pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ? 4. bhagavān āha:
XXsamghscu:529: (1) sūkṣmaṃ vacana buddhānāṃ sarvaśūra śṛṇohi me /
XXsamghscu:532: yathā bālika gaṃgāyā rūpaṃ darśayate tathā //
XXsamghscu:533: (3) buddho darśayate rūpaṃ dharman deśayate svayam /
XXsamghscu:534: buddhaṃ ya icchate draṣṭuṃ lokanāthaṃ jinottamaṃ //
XXsamghscu:536: buddhas tatra bhaven nityaṃ saṃghāṭaṃ yatra tiṣṭhati //
XXsamghscu:537: [SaSū(C) 121] 1. tatra khalu bhagavān punar api sarvaśūraṃ bodhisatvam āmantrayate sma: 2. bhūtapūrvaṃ sarvaśūrātīte 'dhvani navānavaty asaṃkhyeyān kalpān anusmarāmi; 3. tatra dvādaśa buddhakoṭyo babhūvan,
XXsamghscu:538: ratnottamanāmānas, tathāgatā, arhantaḥ, samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ. 4. ahaṃ tena kālena tena samayena pradānaśūro 'bhūvaṃ candro nāma. 5. te ca me dvādaśa buddhakoṭya paryupāsitāḥ; khādanīyabhojanīyamālyagandhavilepanena,
XXsamghscu:540: 6. tatraiva mayā sarvaśūra vyākaraṇam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
XXsamghscu:542: [SaSū(C) 122] 1. anusmarāmy ahaṃ sarvaśūra: aṣṭādaśa buddhakoṭya, sarve ratnāvabhāsanāmānas tathāgatā loka utpannā abhūvan. 2. tatrāham api pradānaśūro 'bhūvaṃ garbhaseno nāma. 3. te cāṣṭādaśa buddhakoṭyo mayā
XXsamghscu:543: paryupāsitāḥ, pūjitāś ca, yathā tathāgatānāṃ pratyarhaṃ
XXsamghscu:544: gandhamālyavilepanālaṃkāravibhūṣaṇaiḥ. 4. tatra ca me vyākaraṇam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
XXsamghscu:545: [SaSū(C) 123] 1. anusmarāmy ahaṃ sarvaśūra: viṃśati buddhakoṭyaḥ śikhisaṃbhavanāmānas, tathāgatā, arhantaḥ, samyaksaṃbuddhā loka udapadyanta. 2. pūjitā me te buddhā bhagavanto yathā pratyarheṇa
XXsamghscu:546: pūjasatkāreṇa. 3. tatraiva ca me vyākaraṇam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
XXsamghscu:547: pratilabdham; 4. na cādyāpi kālasamayam abhūd vyākaraṇāya.
XXsamghscu:548: [SaSū(C) 124] 1. anusmarāmy ahaṃ sarvaśūra: viṃśaty eva buddhakoṭyaḥ
XXsamghscu:549: kāśyapanāmānas, tathāgatā, arhantaḥ, samyaksaṃbuddhā loka udapadyanta. 2.
XXsamghscu:550: tatrāham api pradānaśūro 'bhūvaṃ. 3. kṛtaṃ me teṣāṃ tathāgatānām
XXsamghscu:553: kartavyaṃ tathā kṛtaṃ. 4. tatraiva ca me vyākaraṇam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratilabdhaṃ.
XXsamghscu:555: vimalaprabhāsanāmānas, tathāgatā, arhantaḥ, samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ. 2. tena ca kālena tena samayenāhaṃ gṛhapatir abhūvam, āḍhyo mahādhano, mahābhogaḥ,
XXsamghscu:556: sarvasvaparityāgī. 3. te ca mayā ṣoḍaśa buddhakoṭyaḥ pūjitā,
XXsamghscu:558: ca; yathā tathāgatānāṃ gurūpasthānaṃ kartavyaṃ tathā ca mayā kṛtaṃ. 4.
XXsamghscu:559: tatraiva ca me vyākaraṇam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratilabdhaṃ; 5. na ca me kālaṃ na samayam abhūd vyākaraṇāya.
XXsamghscu:560: [SaSū(C) 126] 1. śṛṇu sarvaśūra, anusmarāmy ahaṃ: paṃcanavatir buddhakoṭyo loka utpannāny abhūvan, sarve śākyamunināmānas, tathāgatā, arhantaḥ,
XXsamghscu:561: samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ. 2. ahaṃ ca tena kālena tena samayena ca rājābhūvaṃ,
XXsamghscu:562: dhārmiko, dharmarājā. 3. paryupāsitā me te paṃcanavatir buddhakoṭyaḥ śākyamunināmadheyās tathāgatāḥ, gandhena, mālyena, vilepanena,
XXsamghscu:563: āstaraṇapravaraṇena, cchatradhvajapatākābhiś ca. 4. tatraiva ca me
XXsamghscu:565: [SaSū(C) 127] 1. anusmarāmy ahaṃ sarvaśūra: navati buddhakoṭyaḥ krakatsudanāmānas, tathāgatā, arhantaḥ, samyaksaṃbuddhā, loka udapadyanta.
XXsamghscu:566: 2. ahaṃ ca tena kālena tena samayena brāhmaṇakumāro 'bhūvam, āḍhyo,
XXsamghscu:567: mahādhano, mahābhogaḥ, pradānadātā, sarvasvaparityāgī. 3. te ca mayā
XXsamghscu:568: tathāgatā sarve upasthitāḥ, gandhena, mālyena, vilepanena,
XXsamghscu:570: upasthānaṃ tathā teṣāṃ mayā pratyarham upasthānaṃ kṛtaṃ. 4. tatraiva ca me
XXsamghscu:571: vyākaraṇam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratilabdhaṃ; 5. na ca me kālaṃ na samayaṃ vyākaraṇāya.
XXsamghscu:572: [SaSū(C) 128] 1. anusmarāmy ahaṃ sarvaśūra: aṣṭādaśa buddhakoṭyo loka
XXsamghscu:574: samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ. 2. ahaṃ ca tena kālena tena samayena pradānaśūro
XXsamghscu:575: 'bhūvam. 3. paryupāsitā me te tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ, pūjitāś ca gandhena, mālyena, vilepanena, āstaraṇaprāvaraṇena, vibhūṣaṇena; yathā tathāgatānāṃ gurūpasthānāṃ tathā me upasthitāḥ. 4. tatraiva ca me
XXsamghscu:576: vyākaraṇam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratilabdhaṃ; 5. na ca me kālaṃ na samayaṃ vyākaraṇāya.
XXsamghscu:577: [SaSū(C) 129] 1. anusmarāmy ahaṃ sarvaśūra: trayodaśa buddhakoṭyo loka
XXsamghscu:579: samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ. 2. te ca me tathāgatāḥ pūjitā, āstaraṇaprāvaraṇena,
XXsamghscu:580: gandhena, mālyena, vilepanācchādanavibhūṣaṇena; yathā tathāgatānāṃ gurūpasthānaṃ kṛtaṃ tādṛśam upasthānam upasthitāḥ. 3. taiś ca tathāgatair
XXsamghscu:581: nānādharmamukhāni bhāṣitāni arthavinayaviniścayāt. 4. tatraiva ca me
XXsamghscu:582: vyākaraṇam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratilabdhaṃ; 5. na cādyāpi samayaṃ
XXsamghscu:584: [SaSū(C) 130] 1. anusmarāmy ahaṃ sarvaśūra: paṃcaviṃśati buddhakoṭyaḥ puṣyanāmānas, tathāgatā, arhantaḥ, samyaksaṃbuddhā loka udapādyanta. 2.
XXsamghscu:585: ahaṃ ca tena kālena tena samayena pravrajito 'bhūvam. 3. paryupāsitā me te
XXsamghscu:586: tathāgatā; yathānanda etarhi mamopasthānam upatiṣṭhati, tādṛśaṃ ca me te tathāgatā upasthitāḥ. 4. tatraiva ca me vyākaraṇam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratilabdhaṃ; 5. na cādyāpi samayam abhūd vyākaraṇāya.
XXsamghscu:587: [SaSū(C) 131] 1. anusmarāmy ahaṃ sarvaśūra: aṣṭādaśa buddhakoṭyo vipaśyināmānas, tathāgatā, arhantaḥ, samyaksaṃbuddhā loka udapadyanta. 2.
XXsamghscu:588: paryupāsitā me te tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ,
XXsamghscu:589: ābharaṇaprāvaraṇena, ācchādanagandhamālyavilepanena; yathā tathāgatopasthānaṃ tathā me upasthitā. 3. ahaṃ ca tena kālena tena samayena pravrajito 'bhūvam. 4. tatraiva cāhaṃ vyākaraṇam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratilabdhavān; 5. na cādyāpi samayaṃ vyākaraṇāya, na cireṇa kālena.
XXsamghscu:590: [SaSū(C) 132] 1. yaḥ paścimako vipaśyī loka utpannaḥ sa imaṃ saṃghāṭaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣitavān. 2. tam ahaṃ jñātvā, tasmin samaye, jaṃbudvīpe saptaratnavarṣaṃ pravṛṣṭavān. tadā te jāṃbudvīpakāḥ satvā adaridrā saṃvṛttāḥ. 3. tatraiva cāhaṃ vyākaraṇam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratilabdhavān; 4. tataś cireṇa kālasamayenādyāpi ca māṃ na vyākaroty
XXsamghscu:592: [SaSū(C) 133] 1. āha: katamaḥ sa bhagavan kālaḥ, katamaḥ sa samayaḥ? 2.
XXsamghscu:593: bhagavān āha: śṛṇu sarvaśūra, tato 'py asaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpair dīpaṃkaro nāma
XXsamghscu:594: tathāgato, 'rhan, samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi. 3. tato 'haṃ sarvaśura tena kālena tena samayena megho nāma māṇavako 'bhūvam. 4. yadā sa dīpaṃkaras tathāgato loka utpannaḥ, tadāham api tasmin kāle tasmin samaye
XXsamghscu:595: brahmacaryam acārṣaṃ māṇavakarūpeṇa. 5. tato 'haṃ, bhagavantan dīpaṃkaran tathāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā, prasādapratilabdhaḥ saptabhir utpalair avakīrṇavām, tac ca tathāgatāvaropitaṃ kuśalamūlam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmitam.
XXsamghscu:596: 6. sa ca mān dīpaṃkaras tathāgato vyākārṣīd: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇavakānāgate 'dhvany asaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpaiḥ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato,
XXsamghscu:598: [SaSū(C) 134] 1. tato 'haṃ sarvaśūra, dvādaśatālamātraṃ vihāyasam antarīkṣe sthitvā, anutpattikadharmakṣāntiṃ pratilabdhavān. 2. yac ca me
XXsamghscu:599: sarvaśūrāsaṃkhyeyeṣu kalpeṣu brahmacaryaṃ cīrṇaṃ, yac ca pāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ, tat sarvam āmukhībhūtam ivānusmarāmi yathādya śvo vā. 3. tatra mayā sarvaśūrānekāni
XXsamghscu:600: satvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāni. 4. kaḥ punar vādaḥ sarvaśūra, ya etarhy aham, anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhaḥ, sarvasatvahitaiṣī, kāruṇikaḥ, satvānāṃ nirodhadharman deśayiṣyāmi.
XXsamghscu:601: [SaSū(C) 135] 1. naitat sthānaṃ vidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ? 2. bahuprakāraṃ cāhaṃ sarvaśūra satvānān dharman deśayāmi: yathārūpavaineyānāṃ satvānāṃ,
XXsamghscu:602: tathārūpeṇa dharman deśayāmi. 3. devarūpeṇa devaloke dharman deśayāmi; 4.
XXsamghscu:603: nāgabhavane nāgarūpeṇa dharman deśayāmi; 5. yakṣabhavane yakṣarūpeṇa dharman deśayāmi; 6. pretabhavane pretarūpeṇa dharman deśayāmi; 7.
XXsamghscu:604: manuṣyaloke manuṣyarūpeṇa dharman deśayāmi; 8. buddhavaineyānāṃ satvānāṃ buddharūpeṇa dharman deśayāmi; 9. bodhisatvāvaineyānāṃ satvānāṃ bodhisatvarūpeṇa dharman deśayāmi; 10. yena yena rūpeṇa satvā vinayaṃ gacchanti, tena tena rūpeṇāhaṃ satvānān dharman deśayāmi; evaṃ bahuprakāram ahaṃ sarvaśūra satvānān dharman deśayāmi.
XXsamghscu:605: [SaSū(C) 136] 1. tat kasya hetor? yathaiva sarvaśūra satvā bahuprakāraṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti, tathaiva te satvasārā bahuprakāraṃ kuśalamūlāni kariṣyanti, 2. dānāni ca dadanti, puṇyāni ca kurvanti, svārthe ca pratijāgaranti, maraṇānusmṛtiṃ ca bhāvayiṣyanti; 3. te caivaṃrūpaṃ kuśalaṃ
XXsamghscu:606: karmābhisaṃskāraṃ kariṣyanti; 4. tena ca dharmaśravaṇahetunā tat pūrvakaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ saṃsmariṣyanti. 5. teṣāṃ tad bhaviṣyati dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca. 6. evaṃ hi sarvaśūra
XXsamghscu:607: saṃghāṭasūtrasya dharmaparyāyasya sahaśravaṇamātreṇaivam aprameyā guṇānuśaṃsā bhaviṣyanti.
XXsamghscu:608: [SaSū(C) 137] 1. atha te satvāḥ parasparam evam āhuḥ: 2. asty anyaḥ kaścit
XXsamghscu:609: kuśalamūlo yasya kṛtatvād upacitatvād anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
XXsamghscu:612: cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya, tān etad avocat: asti kulaputrā! 2. ye dharmaṃ pattīyanti te evaṃ vakṣyanti: asti dharmo yathābhūtaḥ. 3. teṣāṃ
XXsamghscu:614: [SaSū(C) 139] 1. ye punaḥ satvā mohamūḍhās ta evaṃ vakṣyanti: na santi dharmāḥ, nāsti kaścid dharmāṇāṃ pāragaḥ. 2. sa, teṣāṃ mahāphalaṃ kaṭukavipākam, apāyeṣūpapatsyate, punaḥ punaś ca te mohapuruṣā apāyabhūmiparāyaṇā bhaviṣyanti.
XXsamghscu:615: [SaSū(C) 140] aṣṭau kalpān nairāyikān duḥkhāṃ vedanām anubhaviṣyanti;
XXsamghscu:616: dvādaśa kalpāni pretayoniṣu duḥkhāṃ vedanām vedayiṣyanti; 3. ṣoḍaśa kalpāny asureṣūpapatsyante; 4. nava kalpasahasrāni bhūtapiśācayoniṣūpapatsyante; 5. caturdaśa kalpasahasrāṇi ajihvakā
XXsamghscu:617: bhaviṣyanti; 6. ṣoḍaśa kalpasahasrāṇi mātugarbhe kālaṃ kariṣyanti; 7.
XXsamghscu:618: dvādaśa kalpasahasrāṇi māṃsapiṇḍā bhaviṣyanti; 8. ekādaśa kalpasahasrāṇi jātyandhabhūtāḥ prajāsyanti, duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānā.
XXsamghscu:619: [SaSū(C) 141] 1. jātyandhaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā tadā mātāpitṛbhyām evaṃ bhaviṣyati:
XXsamghscu:620: nirāsvādam asmābhir duḥkham anubhūtaṃ; nirāsvādam asmākāṃ putro jātaḥ;
XXsamghscu:621: nirāsvādaṃ navāmāsāḥ kukṣau dhāritaḥ. 2. śītoṣṇāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānaiḥ
XXsamghscu:622: kṣutpipāsāsuḥkhāni ca pratyanubhūtāni, bahūni ca dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyāny,
XXsamghscu:623: anyāni ca duḥkhāni pratyanubhūtāni. 3. tatyathāpināmasarvaśūrajātyandhaṃ putraṃ dṛṣṭvā mātāpitror nautsukyaṃ bhavati, mahatī ca nirāśatā
XXsamghscu:624: bhaviṣyati, evam eva sarvaśūra nirāśāḥ saddharmapratikṣepakāḥ satvāḥ; 4.
XXsamghscu:625: narakatiryakpretaparāyaṇāḥ, te ca tasmin maraṇakālasamaye mahāśokāśalyasamarpitā bhaviṣyanti.
XXsamghscu:626: [SaSū(C) 142] 1. ye tu sarvaśūra satvā evaṃ vācaṃ bhāṣante: asti dharmaḥ,
XXsamghscu:627: asti dharmāṇāṃ pāragaḥ, te tena kuśalamūlena viṃśati kalpāny uttarakuruṣūpapatsyante; 2. paṃcaviṃśati kalpasahasrāṇi trāyastriṃśatāṃ
XXsamghscu:628: devānāṃ sahabhāvyatāyām upapatsyante; 3. trāyastriṃśadbhyo devebhyaś cyavitvā uttarakuruṣūpapatsyante; 4. na ca mātuḥ kukṣāv upapatsyante; 5.
XXsamghscu:629: lokadhātuśatasahasraṃ ca drakṣyanti; sarve ca tāṃ lokadhātavaḥ sukhāvatīnāmānaḥ sarvabuddhakṣetrasandarśanan dṛṣṭvā, tatraiva pratiṣṭhānāṃ kṛtvā, tatraiva bodhim abhisambhotsyante.
XXsamghscu:631: dharmaparyāyaḥ: 2. ye 'smiṃś cittaprasādaṃ kariṣyanti na te jātu viṣamaparihāreṇa kālaṃ kariṣyanti; pariśuddhaśīlasamavāgatās te satvā
XXsamghscu:633: [SaSū(C) 144] 1. santi sarvaśūra satvā ya evaṃ kathayanti: rātrindivam tathāgato bahūni satvāni saṃsārāt parimocayanti, adyāpi satvadhātuḥ kṣayaṃ
XXsamghscu:634: na gacchanti. 2. bahavo bodhāya praṇidhānaṃ kurvanti, bahavaḥ svargaloka upapadyante, bahavo nirvṛtim anuprāpnuvanti; atha kena hetunā satvānāṃ kṣayo na bhavati?
XXsamghscu:635: [SaSū(C) 145] 1. athānyatīrthikacarakaparibrājakanigranthānām etad abhavat: 2. gamiṣyāmo vayaṃ, śramaṇena gautamena sārdhaṃ vivādaṃ
XXsamghscu:637: brāhmaṇānyatīrthikacarakaparibrājakāḥ, anekāni ca nigranthaśatāni, yena rājagṛhaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmanti. 4. tena ca kālena tena samayena bhagavān
XXsamghscu:639: [SaSū(C) 146] 1. atha khalu maitreyo bodhisatvo mahāsatva utthāyāsanād,
XXsamghscu:640: ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā, dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya,
XXsamghscu:641: yena bhagavāṃs tenāṃjaliṃ praṇamya, bhagavantam etad avocat: 2. ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya prāduṣkaraṇāya? nāhetuṃ nāpratyayaṃ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā smitaṃ prāduṣkurvanti.
XXsamghscu:642: [SaSū(C) 147] 1. bhagavān āha: śṛṇu kulaputra, adyeha rājagṛhe mahānagare
XXsamghscu:643: rājagṛhe mahāsannipāto bhaviṣyati. 2. āha: ke bhagavann ihāyāsyanti, devā
XXsamghscu:644: vā, nāgā vā, yakṣā vā, manuṣyā vā, amanuṣyā vā? 3. bhagavān āha: sarva ete maitreyādyehāgamiṣyanti: devanāgayakṣamanuṣyāmanuṣyāḥ, caturaśītiś ca sahasrāṇi brāhmaṇānām ihāyāsyanti;
XXsamghscu:645: [SaSū(C) 148] 1. navati koṭīsahasrāṇi tīrthikacarakaparibrājakanigranthānām ihāyāsyanti. te mayā sārdhaṃ vivādaṃ
XXsamghscu:646: kariṣyanti. 2. teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ vivādaśamanāya dharman deśayiṣyāmi. 3. sarve ca te brāhmaṇā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau cittam utpādayiṣyanti. 4.
XXsamghscu:647: navati koṭīśatasahasrāṇy anyatīrthikacarakaparibrājakanigranthāḥ sarve srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāpsyanti.
XXsamghscu:648: [SaSū(C) 149] aṣṭādaśa koṭīsahasrāṇi nāgarājñām āgamiṣyanti ye mamāntikād
XXsamghscu:649: dharmaṃ śroṣyanti; śrutvā ca sarve 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpādayiṣyanti.
XXsamghscu:651: āgamiṣyanti; 2. tṛṃśat koṭīsahasrāṇi mārāṇāṃ pāpīmatāṃ saparivārāṇām āyāsyanti; 3. dvādaśa koṭīsahasrāṇi asurarājñām āgamiṣyanti; 4.
XXsamghscu:652: paṃcamātrāṇi ca rājaśatāni saparivārāṇy āyāsyanti dharmaśravaṇāya. 5. te sarve mamāntikād dharmaṃ śrutvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny
XXsamghscu:654: [SaSū(C) 151] atha khalu maitreyo bodhisatvo mahāsatvo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā, bhagavantaṃ tṛṣ pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā, tatraivāntardhitataḥ.
XXsamghscu:655: [SaSū(C) 152] 1. atha khalu sarvaśūro bodhisatvo mahāsatva utthāyāsanād,
XXsamghscu:656: ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā, dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya,
XXsamghscu:657: yena bhagavāṃs tenāṃjaliṃ praṇamya, bhagavantam etad avocat: 2. kin nāmāni bhagavan paṃcamātrāṇi
XXsamghscu:658: [SaSū(C) 153] 1. bhagavān āha: śṛṇu sarvaśūra, nando nāma rājā, 2. sunando nāma rājā, 3. upanando nāma rājā, 4. jinarṣabho nāma rājā, 5. brahmaseno nāma rājā, 6. brahmaghoṣo nāma rājā, 7. sudarśano nāma rājā, 8. jayaseno nāma rājā, 9. nandaseno nāma rājā, 10. biṃbisāro nāma rājā, 11. prasenajin nāma rājā, 12. virūḍhako nāma rājā; 13. evaṃpramukhāni paṃcamātrāṇi rājaśatāni, ekaiko rājā viṃśatikoṭīsahasraparivāraḥ. 14. te sarve 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ, sthāpayitvā rājā virūḍhakaḥ.
XXsamghscu:659: [SaSū(C) 154] 1. pūrvasyān diśi tṛṃśat koṭīsahasrāṇi bodhisatvānām āgacchanti; 2. dakṣiṇāyāṃ diśi paṃcāśat koṭīsahasrāṇi bodhisatvānām āgacchanti; 3. paścimāyān diśi ṣaṣṭi koṭīsahasrāṇi bodhisatvānām āgacchanti; 4. uttarasyān diśi aśīti koṭīsahasrāṇi bodhisatvānām āgacchanti; 5. adhastāddiśi navati koṭīsahasrāṇi bodhisatvānām āgacchanti;
XXsamghscu:660: 6. ūrdhvāyān diśi śatakoṭīsahasrāṇi bodhisatvānām āgacchanti; 7. sarve ca daśabhūmipratiṣṭhitāḥ.
XXsamghscu:661: [SaSū(C) 155] atha te sarve bodhisatvā, yena rājagṛhaṃ mahānagaraṃ, yena ca gṛddhrakūṭaparvato, yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntā bhagavato darśanāya vandanāya, sarve ca te bodhisatvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
XXsamghscu:663: [SaSū(C) 156] 1. atha khalu bhagavān sarvaśūraṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam
XXsamghscu:664: āmantrayati sma: 2. gaccha tvaṃ sarvaśūra daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu,
XXsamghscu:665: bodhisatvānām evaṃ vada: 3. adya tathāgato rājagṛhe mahānagare dharman deśayati. tad yūyaṃ sarve daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu sthitā añjalīn praṇāmayatha. 4. anuśrāvya ca muhūrtamātreṇa ca punar eva nivartayasva
XXsamghscu:667: [SaSū(C) 157] atha khalu sarvaśūro bodhisatvo mahāsatva utthāyāsanād,
XXsamghscu:668: bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya, bhagavantaṃ tṛṣ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya,
XXsamghscu:670: [SaSū(C) 158] 1. atha khalu sarvaśūro bodhisatvo mahāsatvo, daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu gatvā, bodhisatvānām ārocayati: 2. adya mārṣā śākyamunis
XXsamghscu:671: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau rājagṛhe mahānagare satvānān dharman deśayati. 3. tad yūyaṃ sādhukāram anuprayacchatha, tad yuṣmākam adyaiva hitāya sukhāya mahālābho bhaviṣyati.
XXsamghscu:672: [SaSū(C) 159] 1. atha khalu sarvaśūro bodhisatvo mahāsatvo, daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu gatvā, sarvabuddhān paryupāsya, bodhisatvānām ārocayitvā,
XXsamghscu:673: tadyathāpināma balavān puruṣo 'cchaṭāsaṃghāṭaṃ kuryād, atrāntare sarvaśūro bodhisatvo mahāsatvo, yena rājagṛhaṃ mahānagaraṃ, yena ca bhagavāṃs,
XXsamghscu:674: tenāgatya, bhagavataḥ purataḥ sthitaḥ. 2. tatra ca sarve
XXsamghscu:675: brāhmaṇānyatīrthikacarakaparibrājakanigranthāḥ sannipatitāḥ; 3. bahavaś ca devanāgamanuṣyāmanuṣyāḥ, paṃcamātrāṇi ca rājaśatāni saparivārāṇi
XXsamghscu:676: sannipatitāni; 4. triṃśat koṭīsahasrāṇi mārāṇāṃ pāpīyasāṃ saparivārāḥ sannipatitā.
XXsamghscu:677: [SaSū(C) 160] 1. tena khalu punaḥ samayena rājagṛhaṃ mahānagaraṃ
XXsamghscu:678: prakaṃpitam. 2. atha khalu daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu divyaṃ candanacūrṇaṃ
XXsamghscu:679: pravarṣitaṃ; 3. divyaṃ ca puṣpavarṣaṃ pravarṣitaṃ. 4. tad bhagavato mūrdhasandhau kūṭāgāraḥ saṃsthitaḥ. 5. tena khalu punaḥ samayena tathāgatasya purataḥ śakro devānām indraḥ sthito 'bhūt. sa vajreṇa bhūmiṃ
XXsamghscu:681: [SaSū(C) 161] 1. atha khalu tasmin samaye caturdiśaṃ catvāro vātarājāna utthāya pravānti, 2. ye ca rājagṛhe mahānagare saṃkarā vā, pāṃsavo vā,
XXsamghscu:682: bālikā vā, tat sarvaṃ nagarād bahiḥ prakṣipanti; 3. daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu gandhodakavarṣaṃ pravarṣanti; 4. daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣūtpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkāṇi pravarṣanti; 5. te ca puṣpās teṣāṃ satvānām upari murdhni puṣpacchatrāṇi tasthire, tathāgatasya copari murdhni. 6. upary antarīkṣe caturaśītiḥ kūṭāgārasahasrāṇi saṃsthitāni, 7.
XXsamghscu:683: teṣu ca caturaśītiṣu puṣpakūṭāgārasahasreṣu caturaśīti sahasrāṇy āsanānāṃ prajñaptāni saptaratnamayāni prādurbhūtāni, 8. sarvatra cāsane tathāgato
XXsamghscu:684: niṣaṇṇo dharman deśayati. 9. atha khalv ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampitaḥ.
XXsamghscu:685: [SaSū(C) 162] 1. atha khalu sarvaśūro bodhisatvo mahāsatvo, yena bhagavāṃs tenāṃjaliṃ praṇamya, bhagavantam etad avocat: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yad imāny evaṃrūpāṇi rājagṛhe mahānagare prātihāryāṇi sandṛśyante? 2. bhagavān āha: tadyathā kaścid eva puruṣaḥ syāc, cañcalaś,
XXsamghscu:686: capalo, 'haṃkāramamakārasthitaḥ; sa ca daridro bhavet. 3. tasya rājā śīrṣaṃ parimārjayed; atha sa puruṣo 'dhimānād, yāvād rājadvāraṃ gatvā,
XXsamghscu:687: balasā taṃ rājakulaṃ praveṣṭum icched. atha te rājāmātyapārṣadyās taṃ puruṣaṃ gṛhṇīyur, bahubhiś ca prakārais tāḍayeyur.
XXsamghscu:688: [SaSū(C) 163] 1. atha tena kālena tena samayena sa rājā śṛṇuyād etāṃ
XXsamghscu:689: prakṛtiṃ: sa daridrapuruṣo balasābhyantaraṃ praveṣṭukāma. iti śrutvā cāsyaivaṃ bhaved: avaśyam ayaṃ mama ghātayitukāmaḥ. 2. tataḥ sa rājā
XXsamghscu:690: ruṣṭas tān pārṣadyān evaṃ vaded: gacchantu bhavanta, etaṃ puruṣaṃ parvatavivaraṃ nītvā jīvitād vyaparopayatha sarvaparivāraṃ; 3.
XXsamghscu:691: mātāpitṛputraduhitṛdāsīdāsakarmakarāṇāṃ ca vyasanam āpādayatha. 4. atha te sarve jīvitād vyavaropitāḥ, 5. tasya ca sarve svajanabandhuvargāḥ paramaśokaśalyasamarpitā bhaveyuḥ.
XXsamghscu:692: [SaSū(C) 164] 1. evam eva sarvaśūra tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ satvānān dharman deśayati. 2. tatra, yathā sa puruṣo 'dhimānika, evaṃ
XXsamghscu:695: [SaSū(C) 165] 1. tatra te bahūn dharmāṃ cchrutvādhimāne patanti,
XXsamghscu:696: nānāpralāpān pralapanti. 2. ahaṃkāramamakāreṇābhibhūtāḥ svayam eva dharmaṃ na śṛṇvanti na prakāśayanti. 3. yaḥ kaścit sūtraṃ vā gāthāṃ vāntaśo
XXsamghscu:697: dṛṣṭāntaṃ vā teṣāṃ ārocayati, tat te na gṛhṇanti, na śrotram avadadhanti:
XXsamghscu:698: vayaṃ svayaṃ jānīmaha iti: 4. tat kasya hetor? yathāpinamādhimānatvāt tena bāhuśrutyena pramādam āpadyante.
XXsamghscu:699: [SaSū(C) 166] 1. ye bālapṛthagjanaiḥ sārdhaṃ samavadhānaṃ kurvanti na te tathārūpaṃ dharmopasaṃhitaṃ vacanaṃ śroṣyanti; 2. te tena bāhuśrutyena
XXsamghscu:700: pramattā bhaviṣyanti; 3. te tathārūpāḥ puruṣāḥ svakāvyāni sthāpayanti,
XXsamghscu:701: svakāni granthānidānāni sthāpayanti; 4. te sarvalokaṃ cātmānaṃ ca
XXsamghscu:702: visaṃpādayanti; 5. vyarthaṃ ca rāṣṭrapiṇḍaṃ prabhūtaṃ paribhokṣyanti,
XXsamghscu:703: bhuktvā ca na samyak pariṇamayiṣyanti. 6. maraṇakālasamaye teṣāṃ mahāsantrāso bhaviṣyati.
XXsamghscu:704: [SaSū(C) 167] 1. te ca satvās taṃ vakṣyanti: bahavas tvayā vayaṃ
XXsamghscu:705: śilpajñānaṃ śikṣāpitāḥ kathaṃ tvaṃ svam ātmānaṃ na śaknuṣe saṃsthāpayituṃ?
XXsamghscu:706: 2. sa teṣāṃ evaṃ vaden: na śakyaṃ mārṣā idānīm ātmānaṃ parisaṃsthāpayituṃ.
XXsamghscu:707: [SaSū(C) 168] 1. tatra te satvās, tasya tad bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā, nānāprakāraṃ
XXsamghscu:708: paridevayiṣyanti. 2. yathā tasyaikapudgalasyārthena bahavo jñātisaṃghā jīvitād vyavaropitā anaparādhinaḥ, svakarmapratyayena, evam eva te satvā
XXsamghscu:709: maraṇakālasamaye, teṣāṃ paridevatāṃ narakatiryagyoniparāyaṇaṃ ātmānaṃ samanupaśyante 'kalyāṇamitrasaṃsargahetoḥ. 3. tad ahaṃ yuṣmākaṃ
XXsamghscu:710: brāhmaṇānām anyatīrthikacarakaparibrājakanigranthānām evaṃ vadāmi: mā yūyaṃ pramattā bhavatha! 4. tadyathāpināmājātapakṣaḥ śakunir na śaknoty ākāśe prakramituṃ devalokagamanāya, evam eva yuṣmābhir
XXsamghscu:711: ahaṃkāramamakārasthitair na śakyaṃ nirvāṇaṃ anuprāptuṃ; na yuṣmākaṃ tathā
XXsamghscu:712: ṛddhiḥ saṃvidyate. 5. tat kasya hetoḥ? karmaprakaraṇena yūyaṃ kukkuṭayonyā
XXsamghscu:713: ivotpannāḥ. 6. na cireṇāyaṃ kāyo bhedanadharmā maraṇaparyavasāno bhaviṣyati. 7. maraṇakālasamaye nirāsvādanatā, paritasyanatā ca bhaviṣyati.
XXsamghscu:714: [SaSū(C) 169] 1. kim ayam asmābhir ātmabhāvaḥ sandhārito ye vayaṃ na devasukhaṃ na pratyanubhaviṣyāma, nāpi nirvāṇapadasthā bhaviṣyāmaḥ? 2.
XXsamghscu:715: nirarthakam asmābhiḥ śarīram udvūḍhaṃ! 3. kā gatir asmābhiḥ kiṃ parāyaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati? 4. kutropapattiḥ, kutra vā nirodho bhaviṣyatīti?
XXsamghscu:716: [SaSū(C) 170] 1. atha khalu bhagavāṃ punar api tān
XXsamghscu:717: anyatīrthikacarakaparibrājakanigranthabrāhmaṇān āmantrayati: 2. mā yūyaṃ mārṣā ratnamayāj jaṃbudvīpān nirāśā bhaviṣyadhve! 3. mā yūyaṃ dharmaratnāt
XXsamghscu:718: paribāhyā bhaviṣyatheti! 4. pṛcchatha yūyaṃ mārṣās tathāgataṃ yad yad
XXsamghscu:720: [SaSū(C) 171] 1. atha khalu te sarve brāhmaṇānyatīrthikacarakaparibrājakanigranthā utthāyāsanebhya, ekāṃsāni cīvarāṇi pravṛtya, aṃjalayaḥ pragṛhya, bhagavantaṃ paripṛcchanti sma: 2.
XXsamghscu:721: bahūni bhagavaṃ satvāni rātrindivas tathāgataḥ saṃsārāt parimocayati, na ca satvadhātor ūnatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate. 3. ko bhagavan hetuḥ
XXsamghscu:722: kaḥ pratyayaḥ yat te satvā samānā utpādanirodhaṃ darśayanti?
XXsamghscu:723: [SaSū(C) 172] 1. atha khalu bhagavān bhaiṣajyasenaṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam
XXsamghscu:726: paripṛcchanti. 3. paścime tu kāle na bhaviṣyanti daharā satvā vṛddhā vā ye utpādanirodhaṃ kariṣyanti. santi bhaiṣajyasena vṛddhā satvā daharā iva na kiṃcij jānanti.
XXsamghscu:727: [SaSū(C) 173] 1. tadyathāpināma bhaiṣajyasena kaścid eva puruṣaḥ śiraḥ
XXsamghscu:728: śocayeta, navakāni ca vastrāṇi pravṛṇuyāt sa ca gṛhād bahir niṣkrameta; 2.
XXsamghscu:729: tam enaṃ satvā āmantrayanti: suprāvṛtāni te navakāni vastrāṇīti. 3. atha kaścid evāparaḥ satvo bhavet; sa śiraḥ śocayeta, purāṇakāni ca vastrāṇi
XXsamghscu:730: prāvṛṇuyāt; tāni ca śithilakāni bhavanti, na ca śobhante. 4. sa ca puruṣaḥ
XXsamghscu:731: susnātaśirā bhavati, vastraṃ cāsya na śobhate. 5. evam eva bhaiṣajyasena
XXsamghscu:732: saṃti vṛddhā satvā ye jaṃbudvīpaṃ na śobhayanti. 6. daharās tu satvā
XXsamghscu:735: 'nyatīrthikacarakaparibrājakanigranthabrāhmaṇā utthāyāsanād, bhagavantam etad avocan: ko bhagavann asmākaṃ vṛddho vā daharo vā? 2. bhagavān āha:
XXsamghscu:736: vṛddhā yūyaṃ! punaḥ punar narakatiryakpreteṣu duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ dṛṣṭvā tad adyāpi yūyaṃ tṛptiṃ
XXsamghscu:739: bhagavantam etad avocan: na bhūyo bhagavann utsahāma saṃsāre duḥkhāṃ
XXsamghscu:740: vedanām anubhavituṃ! 2. te cānyatīrthikacarakaparibrājakanigranthabrāhmaṇā evam āhuḥ: na santi daharā satvā ye śaknuyur dharmatāṃ sākṣātkartum.
XXsamghscu:741: [SaSū(C) 176] 1. atha khalu bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisatvo mahāsatvo bhagavantam
XXsamghscu:742: etad avocat: paśya bhadanta bhagavan kiyad duradhimocyā ime satvāḥ! 2.
XXsamghscu:743: bhagavān āha: śṛṇu bhaiṣajyasena, sāṃprataṃ tathāgataḥ sarvalokapratyakṣaṃ
XXsamghscu:745: [SaSū(C) 177] 1. atha khalu caturnavati koṭīsahasrāṇi navakānāṃ satvānāṃ
XXsamghscu:746: te tathāgatasya purataḥ sthitāḥ. na ca tathāgataṃ vandanti, nālapanti, na
XXsamghscu:747: saṃlapanti. 2. atha khalu bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisatvo mahāsatvo bhagavantam
XXsamghscu:748: etad avocat: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yad ete satvā bhagavantaṃ
XXsamghscu:749: nālapanti, na saṃlapanti, na vandanti, na ca bhagavantaṃ paripṛcchanti? 3.
XXsamghscu:750: bhagavān āha: śṛṇu bhaiṣajyasena, satvā evaṃ vadanti: na śakyaṃ navakaiḥ
XXsamghscu:751: satvair dharmatā sākṣātkartum. 4. ta ete bhaiṣajyasena navakāḥ satvā yuṣmābhir draṣṭavyāḥ. 5. te ca satvā evaṃ āhur: vayaṃ bhagavan navakāḥ
XXsamghscu:752: satvā, vayaṃ sugata navakāḥ satvā! 6. bhagavān āha: eṣāṃ bho satvānāṃ
XXsamghscu:753: lokapratyakṣaṃ, sāṃprataṃ svaśarīrāl lokasya pramāṇaṃ darśayatha.
XXsamghscu:754: [SaSū(C) 178] 1. tena khalu punaḥ kālena tena samayena caturnavati koṭīsahasrāṇi navakānāṃ satvānāṃ, kāyasya bhedād antarīkṣe sthitvā,
XXsamghscu:755: daśabhūmipratilabdhā abhūvan. 2. atha khalu bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisatvo mahāsatvo bhagavantam etad avocat: sulabdhālābhā bhagavann īdṛśāḥ satvāḥ ye saṃsāre parikṣayāya paryādānāya vīryam ārabhante. 3. adyaiva bhagavann ime satvā utpannāḥ, adyaiva bhagavann ime satvāḥ parimuktāḥ, adyaiva sarve daśabhūmipratiṣṭhitā dṛṣṭāḥ.
XXsamghscu:756: [SaSū(C) 179] 1. atha khalu sarvabrāhmaṇānyatīrthikacarakaparibrājakanigranthā, nāgarājāno 'pi, mārāś ca pāpīmān saparivāra upasaṃkrānto vicakṣuṣkaraṇāya, sarve bhagavantam etad avocann: iha vayaṃ bhagavans tathāgatasyāntikam upasaṃkrāntā vicakṣuṣkaraṇāya. 2. te vayaṃ bhagavann, iman dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā,
XXsamghscu:757: prasādapratilabdhā abhūma buddhe ca dharme ca. 3. tatrāsmākaṃ bhagavan sarveṣām evaṃ bhagavaty: evaṃrūpaṃ buddhasukhaṃ pratilabhemahe! 4.
XXsamghscu:758: evaṃrūpāś ca tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke bhavemaḥ.
XXsamghscu:759: [SaSū(C) 180] 1. bhagavān āha: evam etad bhadramukhā! yathā yūyaṃ tathāgatasyāntikam upasaṃkrāntāḥ, tairyuṣmābhir imaṃ saṃghāṭaṃ
XXsamghscu:760: dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā, ānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittaṃ utpāditaṃ. 2.
XXsamghscu:761: tena yūyaṃ bhadramukhāḥ kuśalamūlena na cireṇa kālenānuttarāṃ
XXsamghscu:763: [SaSū(C) 181] 1. samanantarabhāṣitā ca tathāgateneyaṃ vāg, atha teṣāṃ sarveṣām anyatīrthikacarakaparibrājakanigranthabrāhmaṇānām anutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilābho 'bhūt, 2. sarve ca daśabhūmipratiṣṭhitā
XXsamghscu:764: bodhisatvāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ, 3. sarve ca te bodhisatvā, upary antarīkṣe sapta
XXsamghscu:765: tālān vaihāyasam abhyudgamya, saptaratnamayāni kūṭāgārāṇi tathāgatasyopanāmayanti, 4. sarve ca nānāvikurvādhiṣṭhānardhyabhisaṃkārān
XXsamghscu:766: abhisaṃskurvanti. 5. atha te, bhagavata upari mūrdhni sthitvā bhagavantaṃ nānāpuṣpair abhyavakiranti. 6. tathāgatāṃś ca manasikurvanti, svakāye ca buddhasaṃjñām utpādayanty. 7. anekāni ca devaputrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi
XXsamghscu:768: [SaSū(C) 182] evaṃ ca vācam abhāśanta: mahālābhaḥ śramaṇo gautamaḥ!
XXsamghscu:769: mahākṣetro, lokanāthaḥ; samādhibalādhānaprāptaḥ; vijño, vijñārthikaḥ, yaḥ īdṛśān satvān saṃsārād anupūrveṇopāyakauśalyena parimocayaty: ekena subhāṣitamātreṇa etāvanti satvāni saṃsārāt parimucyante!
XXsamghscu:770: [SaSū(C) 183] 1. atha khalu bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisatvo mahāsatva utthāyāsanād, ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā, dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ
XXsamghscu:771: pratiṣṭhāpya, yena bhagavāṃs tenāṃjaliṃ praṇamya, bhagavantam etad avocat:
XXsamghscu:772: 2. ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yad ete devaputrā evaṃ vācaṃ
XXsamghscu:773: niścārayanti, bahūni ca rdhyabhisaṃskārān kurvanti, bahūni ca tathāgatasya
XXsamghscu:774: varṇān abhisaṃstuvanti sma? 3. bhagavān āha: śṛṇu kulaputra, na hi te māṃ
XXsamghscu:775: stuvanti, svakāyam eva stunvanti; 4. svakāyam eva dharmarājāsane
XXsamghscu:777: svakāyād eva dharmaraśmin niścārayiṣyanti; 7. sarvabuddhaparigṛhītāś ca bhaviṣyanty anuttarāsyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher abhisaṃbodhāya, abhisaṃbudhya ca dharman deśayiṣyanti.
XXsamghscu:778: [SaSū(C) 184] 1. atha khalu bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisatvo mahāsatvo bhagavantam
XXsamghscu:779: etad avocat: bahavo bhadanta bhagavan satvāḥ, bahavo bhadanta sugata satvā rātrindivaṃ parimucyante; tad adyāpi satvānāṃ kṣayo na bhavati. 2.
XXsamghscu:780: bhagavān āha: sādhu sādhu bhaiṣajyasena yas tvaṃ tathāgatam etam arthaṃ paripraṣṭavyaṃ manyase. śṛṇu bhaiṣajyasena! 3. tadyathāpināma bhaiṣajyasena kaścid eva puruṣo bhaved, āḍhyo, mahādhano, mahābhogaḥ,
XXsamghscu:782: bahudāsadāsīkarmakarapauruṣeyāni cāsya syur, bahūni ca dhanaskandhāni,
XXsamghscu:783: bahūni ca kṣetrārāmāṇi saṃvidyeran, bahūni ca dhanadhānyāni; 4. sa ca puruṣo vasantakāle sarvāṇi tāni dhanadhānyāni vāpayet. 5. atha yāvad apareṇa kālasamayena sarvāṇi tāni bījāni paripacyeran, sa paripakvānīti viditvā, tataḥ sa puruṣas tāni dhanadhānyāni gṛhasyābhyantare pṛthak pṛthak sthāpayati; sthāpayitvā paribhuṃkte. 6. yāvad vasantakāle punar eva bījāni vāpayati.
XXsamghscu:784: [SaSū(C) 185] 1. evam eva bhaiṣajyasena ime satvāḥ, pūrvaṃ śubhaṃ karma
XXsamghscu:785: kṛtvā, paścāt teṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ parikṣayāt, punaḥ punar api puṇyakṣetram
XXsamghscu:786: anveṣante, kuśalamūlāny avaropayanti. 2. kuśalamūlāny avaropayitvā tatra
XXsamghscu:787: ca kuśaladharme pratipattyā saṃpādayanti. 3. pratipattisaṃpannā sarvadharmān vardhayanti. 4. sarvadharmān vardhayitvā prītiprāmodyam
XXsamghscu:788: utpādayanti, 5. tena ca prītiprāmodyacittena bhaiṣajyasenānekāni kalpakoṭīsahasrāṇi na nāśyante. 6. evam eva bhaiṣajyasena
XXsamghscu:789: prathamacittotpādiko bodhisatvo na kadācid vināśadharmā bhavati,
XXsamghscu:791: [SaSū(C) 186] āha: 1. kathaṃ bhagavan prathamacittotpādiko bodhisatvaḥ svapnaṃ paśyati? 2. bhagavān āha: bahūni bhaiṣajyasena prathamacittotpādiko bodhisatvaḥ svapnāntare bhayāni paśyati. 3. tat kasya hetor? yadā svapnāntare bhayāni paśyati, tadā sarvapāpakāni karmāṇi
XXsamghscu:792: pariśodhayati. 4. na śakyaṃ bhaiṣajyasena pāpakarmaṇā satvena tīvraṃ
XXsamghscu:793: duḥkham apanayitum, na ca pāpena svapnena dṛṣṭenāsya bhayaṃ bhavati.
XXsamghscu:795: bodhisatvaḥ svapnāntare bhayāni paśyati? 2. bhagavān āha: agniṃ bhaiṣajyasena prajvalitaṃ paśyati. tatas tena bodhisatvenaivaṃ veditavyaṃ:
XXsamghscu:796: sarvakleśā me dagdhāḥ. 3. dvitīyaṃ bhaiṣajyasena udakaṃ paśyati, luḍitaṃ,
XXsamghscu:797: saṃpraluḍitaṃ. tatra tena prathamacittotpādikena bodhisatvena na bhetavyaṃ. 4. tat kasya hetoḥ? evaṃ hi bhaiṣajyasena, sarvapāpakṣayaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati. 5. tṛtīyaṃ bhaiṣajyasena prathamacittotpādiko bodhisatvaḥ svapnaṃ paśyati mahābhayaṃ. 6. āha: katamaṃ bhagavan?
XXsamghscu:798: [SaSū(C) 188] 1. bhagavān āha: svaśarīre śīrṣaṃ muṇḍitaṃ paśyati. tatra tena bodhisatvena na bhetavyaṃ. 2. tenaivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ:
XXsamghscu:799: rāgadveṣamohāni me muṇḍitāni bhavanti, 3. ṣaḍgatikaṃ ca me saṃsāraṃ parājitaṃ bhaviṣyati. 4. na hi tasya narakāvāso bhaviṣyati, na tiryakṣu,
XXsamghscu:800: na preteṣu vā, nāsureṣu vā, na nāgeṣu, na deveṣu. 5. pariśuddheṣu bhaiṣajyasena buddhakṣetreṣu prathamacittotpādiko bodhisatva upapattiṃ
XXsamghscu:802: [SaSū(C) 189] 1. bhaiṣajyasena, paścime kāle paścime samaye, yadi kaścit satvo bodhau cittaṃ pariṇamayiṣyati, tena mahatī paribhāṣaṇā draṣṭavyā,
XXsamghscu:803: paribhūtavāsaś ca bhaviṣyati. 2. tatra tena bhaiṣajyasena na parikhedacittam utpādayitavyaṃ, na viṣīditavyaṃ.
XXsamghscu:804: [SaSū(C) 190] 1. bahavo bhaiṣajyasena mayā dharmā deśitāḥ. 2. mayā ca bhaiṣajyasenānekāni kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi duṣkaracaryā cīrṇā. 3. na mayā bhaiṣajyasena rājyabhogārthāya vā, vṛttibhogārthāya vā,
XXsamghscu:805: aiśvaryabhogārthāya vā duṣkaracaryā cīrṇā; svabhāvadharmāvabodhāya bhaiṣajyasena mayā duṣkaracaryā cīrṇā. 4. na ca me tāvad anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ prāptā yāvan na mayāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ śrutaḥ: 5. yasmiṃs tu bhaiṣajyasena kālasamaye mayāyaṃ saṃghāṭo dharmaparyāyaḥ śrutaḥ,
XXsamghscu:806: tatraiva divase anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā. 6. gaṃbhīro 'yaṃ
XXsamghscu:808: paramadurlabho bhaiṣajyasena tathāgatānām utpādaḥ. paramadurlabho bhaiṣajyasenāsya dharmaparyāyasya
XXsamghscu:809: [SaSū(C) 191] 1. ye te iman dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyanti, sarve te 'nuttarāṃ
XXsamghscu:812: nirodhamārgaṃ ca prajñāsyanti. 4. bhavyāś ca te niśrayaṃ prajñātuṃ,
XXsamghscu:813: bhavyāḥ kuśalasthānaṃ prajñatuṃ, bhavyā abhijñākuśalasthānaṃ prajñatum,
XXsamghscu:815: [SaSū(C) 192] 1. nirodham eva bhaiṣajyasena kimartham ucyate? 2. āha:
XXsamghscu:816: artha ucyate bhagavan dharmasthānam. 3. bhagavān āha: katamaṃ bhaiṣajyasena dharmasthānaṃ? 4. āha: dharma ucyate bhagavann
XXsamghscu:818: ucyate. idaṃ bhagavan dharmanidhānaṃ saṃbhavati. 5. bhagavān āha: sādhu sādhu bhaiṣajyasena yas tvaṃ tathāgatam etam arthaṃ paripraṣṭavyaṃ
XXsamghscu:820: [SaSū(C) 193] 1. āha: kena kāreṇa na bhagavaṃs tathāgatā loka utpadyante?
XXsamghscu:821: 2. bhagavān āha: ye bhaiṣajyasena bāhuśrutyasamanvāgamaṃ prajānanti, te tathāgatānām utpādaṃ prajānanti. 3. te tathāgatānām utpādaṃ jñātvā, idaṃ tathāgatānām utpāde sukhasthānaṃ prajānanti. 4. yadā ca tathāgatā loka
XXsamghscu:822: utpadyante, tadā satvā sarvadharmān prajānanti. laukikalokottarān dharmān prajānanti. laukikalokottarāṇi jñānāni prajānanti.
XXsamghscu:823: [SaSū(C) 194] 1. āha: jñānam evaṃ jñātvā, katamaṃ nirvāṇaṃ prajānanti? 2.
XXsamghscu:824: bhagavān āha: dharmam eva bhaiṣajyasena prajānanti. 3. dharmam eva jñātvā,
XXsamghscu:825: evam eva bhaiṣajyasena dharmasaṃgrahaṃ prajānatāṃ prathamo lābha
XXsamghscu:826: utpadyate. 4. yathāśrutaṃ gṛhya, dhārmika eva lābho bhaviṣyati.
XXsamghscu:827: [SaSū(C) 195] tadyathāpināma bhaiṣajyasena kaścid eva puruṣo vāṇijako
XXsamghscu:828: bhavet. sa, lābhahetor gacchan, parakyasvakasya suvarṇasya puruṣabhārasahasraṃ gṛhītvā, gacchet. 2. tasya tau mātāpitarāv evam
XXsamghscu:829: āhutuḥ: 3. śṛṇu putra, idaṃ suvarṇasya puruṣabhārasahasraṃ gṛhītvā parakyasvakasya ca, tat tvayedaṃ suvarṇaṃ sugṛhītaṃ kartavyaṃ, na ca kiṃcid ato vināśayitavyaṃ. mahālābhaṃ kṛtvā, suvarṇaṃ eva sugṛhītaṃ kuru,
XXsamghscu:830: tad asmākaṃ mahālābho bhaviṣyati, sukhaṃ ca jīviṣyāmaḥ. 4. sa ca putras
XXsamghscu:831: tau mātāpitarāv evaṃ vaded: evaṃ kariṣyāmi, ity uktvā, sa vāṇijakaḥ suvarṇaṃ gṛhītvā gacched. atha sa vāṇijakaḥ pramādād yāvan māsamātreṇa
XXsamghscu:834: śokaśalyenāviddhahṛdayaḥ; sahrīr apatrāpyena ca svagṛhaṃ na paraviśeta. 2.
XXsamghscu:835: tasya tau mātāpitarau śṛṇuyātāṃ: evaṃ yuvābhyāṃ putreṇa tat suvarṇaṃ sarvaṃ vināśitam. iti śrutvā nirāśībhūtau; śokaśalyenābhyāhatahṛdayau,
XXsamghscu:836: vastrāṇi pāṭayataḥ, śocataḥ krandataḥ. 3. evaṃ ca paridevataḥ: duṣputro
XXsamghscu:837: 'smākaṃ gṛhe putrarūpeṇotpannaḥ. sakalaṃ eva gṛhaṃ vināśītavān. asmākam anāthaṃ kṛtvā, dāsau karmakarau kṛtau. 4. tasya tau mātāpitarau,
XXsamghscu:838: cintāparigatahṛdayau, nirāśau, kālagatau. 5. tatas tena putreṇa śrutaṃ:
XXsamghscu:839: matāpitarau me, nirāśau kālagatau. so 'pi putro, nirāśa eva, kālagataḥ.
XXsamghscu:840: [SaSū(C) 197] 1. evam eva bhaiṣajyasena tathāgato 'py etam arthaṃ bhāṣate:
XXsamghscu:841: 2. ye satvā mama śāsane na prasīdanti te nirāśībhūtā maraṇakālasamaye,
XXsamghscu:843: yathā tau mātāpitarau nirāśau śocataḥ, paridevataḥ, suvarṇahetoḥ
XXsamghscu:846: [SaSū(C) 198] 1. evam eva bhaiṣajyasena, ye mama śasane na prasīdanti,
XXsamghscu:847: paścān maraṇakālasamaye, paritapyamānāḥ paridevanto duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ
XXsamghscu:848: vedayanti, 2. pūrvakṛtāni ca puṇyāni paribhuktvā, na bhūyo 'nyāni puṇyāni kurvanti sukṣetragatāni. 3. teṣāṃ śokaśalyaparigatahṛdayānāṃ, tena kālena tena samayena, narakatiryagyoniyamalokopapattiṃ ghorāṃ dāruṇān dṛṣṭvā maraṇakālasamaye evaṃ bhavati: 4. ko me trātā bhaved? yad ahaṃ narakatiryakpretayamalokaṃ na paśyeyan, na ca tāṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayeyaṃ!
XXsamghscu:849: [SaSū(C) 199] 1. tasya mātāpitarāv evam āhatuḥ: kiṃ kariṣyāma putraka?
XXsamghscu:851: (1) grahītuṃ śakyate naiva vyādhir duḥkhaṃ mahābhayaṃ /
XXsamghscu:852: nāsti te maraṇaṃ putra glānasya maraṇād bhayaṃ //
XXsamghscu:855: (2) niruddhyate me vijñānaṃ kāyo me pīḍyate bhṛśam /
XXsamghscu:856: sarve aṅgāni duḥkhanti mṛtyuṃ paśyāmi ātmanaḥ //
XXsamghscu:857: (3) na paśyataś cakṣuṣī me karṇau me na śṛṇonti ca /
XXsamghscu:858: śrotraṃ punar na lapsyāmi na kāyaḥ saṃsahiṣyati //
XXsamghscu:860: visvādayasi me amba nāgataṃ maraṇaṃ tava //
XXsamghscu:862: (5) vaktuṃ nārhasi putraivaṃ mā me trāsaparāṃ kuru /
XXsamghscu:865: (6) na paśyāmi jvaraṃ kāye na ca vyādhir na duḥkhati /
XXsamghscu:866: paśyāmi maranaṃ ghoraṃ hataṃ kāyaṃ ca me bhṛśam //
XXsamghscu:868: (8) gacchāmi kasya śaraṇaṃ ko me trātā bhaviṣyati //
XXsamghscu:869: mātāpitā vadet putra devakrodhaṃ hi te bhavet /
XXsamghscu:870: (9) devebhyo yajanaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ svastir bhaviṣyati //
XXsamghscu:872: kariṣyathā yūyam eva yena svastir bhaven mama /
XXsamghscu:873: (10) śīghraśīghraṃ ca gatvā vai pṛcchathā devapālakam //
XXsamghscu:874: [SaSū(C) 200] 1. atha tasya tau mātāpitarau, devakulaṃ gatvā, devasya dhūpaṃ dāpayanti. 2. atha sa devapālako, devasya dhūpaṃ datvā, evaṃ vācaṃ bhāṣate; 3. devas te kruddhaḥ; devasyopakāraḥ kartavyaḥ, yajanaṃ
XXsamghscu:875: kartavyaṃ, tatra paśur ghātayitavyaḥ, puruṣaś ca ghātayitavyaḥ; tatas te putro vyādheḥ parimokṣyate. 4. atha tau mātāpitarau cintayataḥ: kathaṃ
XXsamghscu:876: kariṣyāmo? daridrāś cāsma. 5. yadi devo na prasīdati, tad asmākaṃ putraḥ
XXsamghscu:877: kālaṃ kariṣyati; 6. atha vā prasādaṃ kuryāt, tad vayaṃ paramadaridrāḥ.
XXsamghscu:879: [SaSū(C) 201] 1. atha tau śīghraśīghraṃ svagṛhaṃ gatvā, yat kiṃcid gṛhe
XXsamghscu:880: pariṣkāraṃ saṃvidyate, tat sarvaṃ vikrīya, paśukrayārthe gacchataḥ. 2.
XXsamghscu:881: atha tāvad anyataraṃ puruṣam evaṃ vadeyuḥ: dehi bhoḥ puruṣa suvarṇam asmākaṃ yācitaṃ; 3. yadi śaknumo daśame divase punar api dātuṃ, tac
XXsamghscu:882: chobhanam; 4. atha na śaknumo dātuṃ, tad vayaṃ tava dāsā bhaviṣyāmaḥ,
XXsamghscu:883: karmakarāḥ. 5. tau ca taṃ suvarṇaṃ gṛhītvā gaccheyuḥ puruṣaṃ kretuṃ.
XXsamghscu:884: [SaSū(C) 202] 1. tābhyāṃ puruṣaḥ krītaḥ; 2. sa ca puruṣo na jānīyād yan:
XXsamghscu:885: mām ete jīvitād vyavaropayiṣyanti. 3. atha tau mātāpitarau, saṃmoham
XXsamghscu:886: āpannau, na bhūyaḥ svagṛhaṃ praviṣṭau; 4. tau devakulaṃ gatvā devapalakam
