XXsamghscu:887: āmantrayanti: śīghram idānīṃ yajanaṃ kuruṣva! 5. atha tau mātāpitarau
XXsamghscu:888: svayam eva taṃ paśuṃ ghātayataḥ, taṃ ca puruṣaṃ jīvitād vyavaropayataḥ. 6.
XXsamghscu:889: tataḥ sa devapālaka ārabdho yajñaṃ yajanāya medaṃ prajvālayati. 7. tataḥ sa devo 'vatīrya evaṃ kathayati: tava putro mayā parigṛhītā iti. 8. tatas tau mātāpitarau, prītiprāmodyena sphuṭāv, āhatuḥ: varaṃ putro jīvatu,
XXsamghscu:890: vayaṃ dāsā bhaviṣyāmaḥ. 9. tatas tau mātāpitarau nivartya suyaṣṭaṃ devaṃ
XXsamghscu:891: kṛtvā, yāvat svagṛhaṃ gatvā, tadā taṃ putraṃ kālagataṃ paśyanti. 10. tatas tau mātāpitarau, mahatā duḥkhadaurmanasyena śokaśalyenāviddhahṛdayau,
XXsamghscu:892: nirāśībhūtau tatraiva kālagatau. 11. evam eva bhaiṣajyasenākalyāṇamitrasaṃsargatā draṣṭavyā.
XXsamghscu:893: [SaSū(C) 203] 1. āha: pṛcchāmi tāvad bhagavan: kutas bhagavan teṣāṃ
XXsamghscu:894: satvānām upapattiḥ? 2. bhagavān āha: alaṃ, ma me bhaiṣajyasena paripṛccha!
XXsamghscu:895: 3. āha: pṛcchāmi bhagavan, pṛcchāmi sugata! 4. bhagavān āha: tatra bhaiṣajyasena mātā raurave mahānarake upapannā, pitā saṃghāte mahānarake
XXsamghscu:896: upapannaḥ, putras tapane mahānarake upapannaḥ, devapālako mahāvīcau mahānarake upapannaḥ.
XXsamghscu:898: ko 'syābhisaṃparāyaḥ? 2. bhagavān āha: iha bhaiṣajyasenānaparādhikasya puruṣasya trāyastriṃśānān devānām sahabhāvyatāyām upapattiḥ. 3. āha: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yat sa puruṣas trāyastriṃśanāṃ devānāṃ sahabhāvyatāyām upapannaḥ? 4. bhagavān āha: śṛṇu bhaiṣajyasena sa puruṣo maraṇakālasamaye tathāgatasyopari cittaṃ prasādya, evaṃ vācam abhāṣata:
XXsamghscu:899: namas tasya bhagavatas tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya, ity
XXsamghscu:900: ekavārākṛtaṃ. 5. sa tena bhaiṣajyasena kuśalamūlena ṣaṣṭiḥ kalpān
XXsamghscu:901: trāyastriṃśatāṃ devānāṃ sukham anubhaviṣyati; 6. aśīti kalpāṃ jātyā
XXsamghscu:902: jātismaro bhaviṣyati; 7. jātau jātau ca sarvaśokavigato bhaviṣyati; 8.
XXsamghscu:903: jātamātraś ca sarvaduḥkhāni nirvāpayiṣyati; na hi te sarvasatvā śakyaṃ parinirvāpayitum.
XXsamghscu:904: [SaSū(C) 205] 1. evam ukte bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisatvo mahāsatvo bhagavantam
XXsamghscu:905: etad avocat: kathaṃ bhagavan na śakyaṃ sarvasatvāḥ parinirvāpayitum? 2.
XXsamghscu:906: bhagavān āha: vīryaṃ bhaiṣajyasenārabdhavyam. 3. āha: katamo bhagavan vīryāraṃbhaḥ? 4. bhagavān āha: śṛṇu bhaiṣajyasena, vīryam ucyate phalānāṃ
XXsamghscu:907: darśanaṃ. yad uta srotaāpattiphalaṃ nāma, vīryasthānaṃ; 6.
XXsamghscu:908: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nāma, vīryasthānaṃ; 7. anāgāmiphalaṃ nāma, vīryasthānaṃ;
XXsamghscu:911: bodhisatvabhūmiphalaṃ ca, bodhisthānaṃ, vīryasthānaṃ nāma. 11. ime bhaiṣajyasena vīryasthānānāṃ
XXsamghscu:913: srotaāpattiphalañ ca? 2. bhagavān āha: tadyathāpināma kaścid eva
XXsamghscu:914: bhaiṣajyasena puruṣa vṛkṣaṃ vāpayeta; 3. vāpitasya vṛkṣasya tatraiva
XXsamghscu:915: divase aṅkuraṃ viruhyeta; 4. yatraiva divase aṅkurāṇi viruhyeraṃs,
XXsamghscu:916: tatraiva divase tad aṃkuraṃ yojanam adhastād gacchete. 5. dvitīyaś ca puruṣa evam eva vṛkṣaṃ vāpayeta; 6. tatraiva divase vātakṣobhena tasya vṛkṣasya nāṅkurāṇi viruhyeran; atha sa puruṣas tasmāt sthānāt taṃ vṛkṣaṃ
XXsamghscu:917: uddharet. 7. athānyataraś ca puruṣaḥ kalahabhaṇḍanavigrahavivādaṃ kuryāt:
XXsamghscu:919: [SaSū(C) 207] 1. tena ca rājā aśrauṣīd evaṃ: dvau
XXsamghscu:921: tayor dūtaḥ preṣitaḥ: gaccha bhoḥ puruṣa, tau dvau puruṣāv ānaya! 3. evaṃ
XXsamghscu:922: deveti, sa puruṣas tvaramāṇarūpaḥ pradhāvitvā, tau puruṣāv etad avocat:
XXsamghscu:923: rājā yuvayor āmantrayati. 4. atha tāvad eva tatraikapuruṣo bhītas, trasto;
XXsamghscu:924: dvitīyaś ca puruṣo bhīto, 'nutrastaḥ. 5. yena rājā tenopanītāv upanīya,
XXsamghscu:925: rājñaḥ purataḥ sthāpitāv, atha rājā tayor evam āha: 6. kimiti bho yuvayoḥ
XXsamghscu:927: [SaSū(C) 208] 1. atha khalu tau dvau puruṣāv utthāya rājānam etad avocatāṃ: 2. śṛṇu mahārāja, asmākaṃ na kiṃcit pṛthivīpradeśaḥ saṃvidyate.
XXsamghscu:928: 3. yācitake pṛthivīpradeśe vṛkṣo vāpitaḥ. 4. yatraiva divase vāpitas,
XXsamghscu:929: tatraiva divase 'ṅkuraṃ, patrāṇi, puṣpāṇi, phalāni ca prādurbhūtāni,
XXsamghscu:930: āmārdhaṃ pakvārdhaṃ ca. 5. etena ca dvitīyena puruṣeṇa tatraiva divase
XXsamghscu:931: tasmin pṛthivīpradeśe vṛkṣo vāpitaḥ, 6. tasya ca vṛkṣasya nāṃkurāṇi
XXsamghscu:932: rohanti; 7. vātena kṣubhitena na patrāṇi, na puṣpāṇi, na phalāni prādurbhūtāni, 8. na ca mahārāja yojanam adhastād asya mūlaṃ gacchati. 9.
XXsamghscu:933: sa eṣa puruṣo mayā sārdhaṃ vivadati: tavāparādha iti. 10. api tu ca deva svayam eva parīkṣya jānīyān: nātra mama kiṃcid aparādhaḥ saṃvidyate.
XXsamghscu:934: [SaSū(C) 209] 1. atha khalu sa rājā triṃśat koṭyo 'mātyānām āhūyaikadhye sannipātyaivam āha: kathayatha yūyaṃ. 2. amātyā āhuḥ: kiṃ kathayāma mahārāja? 3. rājāha: kvacid yuṣmābhir dṛṣṭaṃ vā śrutaṃ vā, yatraiva divase vṛkṣo vāpitas, tatraiva divase 'ṅkuraṃ viruhyate, 4. patrāṇi, puṣpāṇi,
XXsamghscu:935: phalāni ca jāyante, pakvārdhamāmārdhāni? 5. niścayam idaṃ bhavadbhiḥ
XXsamghscu:936: kartavyaṃ. 6. atha khalu te amātya utthāyāsanāt, taṃ rājānam evam āhuḥ:
XXsamghscu:937: asmākaṃ mahārāja niścayam idaṃ na śobhate kartuṃ, na ca śakṣyāmo 'sya
XXsamghscu:938: niścayaṃ vaktuṃ. 7. vismayam idaṃ mahārāja! 8. eṣa eva puruṣas tāvat
XXsamghscu:939: praṣṭavyaḥ. 9. vada bhoḥ puruṣa, kiṃ satyam etam arthaṃ yad vadasi? 10.
XXsamghscu:941: (1) na śrutaṃ naiva paṣyāma duḥśrāddheyaṃ vacas tava /
XXsamghscu:942: vṛkṣo yatra dine vuptas tatraivāṅkurito dine //
XXsamghscu:943: (2) patrāḥ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ dattaṃ dine tatraiva bhāṣase /
XXsamghscu:944: kṛtāṃjāliḥ sa puruṣas taṃ rājānam athābravīt //
XXsamghscu:945: (3) gaccha svayaṃ vāpaya taruṃ paśya ruhyati aṅkuram //
XXsamghscu:946: [SaSū(C) 210] 1. atha khalu sa rājā tṛṃśatkoṭibhir amātyaiḥ sārdhaṃ bahir niṣkrāmati, 2. tau ca dvau puruṣau cārakāvarodhaṃ kārayati. 3. tataḥ sa rājā svayam eva vṛkṣaṃ vāpayati, na ca sa vṛkṣo 'ṅkurāṇi dadāti, na
XXsamghscu:947: patrāṇi, na puṣpāṇi, na phalāni. 4. atha sa rājā ruṣṭa evam āha: gacchantu
XXsamghscu:948: bhavantaḥ, śīghram ānayantu dārupāṭakāni kuṭhārāṇi. 5. yāvad ānayitvā, yas tena puruṣeṇa vāpito vṛkṣaḥ sapatrapuṣpaphalaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ, taṃ vṛkṣaṃ roṣāc chedayati.
XXsamghscu:949: [SaSū(C) 211] 1. taṃ caikaṃ vṛkṣaṃ chinnaṃ, dvādaśa vṛkṣāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ;
XXsamghscu:950: 2. dvādaśa vṛkṣāś chinnāś, caturviṃśati vṛkṣāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ,
XXsamghscu:951: saptaratnamayāḥ, samūlāḥ, sapatrāḥ, sapahalāḥ, sāṃkurāḥ. 3. atha tebhyaś caturviṃśati vṛkṣebhyaś caturviṃśati pakṣiṇaḥ kukkuṭāḥ prādurbhūtāni,
XXsamghscu:952: suvarṇacūḍāni, suvarṇatuṇḍāni, saptaratnamayāni pakṣmāṇi. 4. atha khalu sa
XXsamghscu:953: rājā roṣābhibhūtaḥ svahastena kaṭhāraṃ gṛhya taṃ vṛkṣaṃ parāhanati; tataś ca vṛkṣāt parāhatād amṛtodakaṃ pravahati.
XXsamghscu:954: [SaSū(C) 212] 1. atha khalu sa rājā saṃvignamanā ājñāpayati: gacchata, tau puruṣau tataś cārakābandhanān mocayadhvam. 2. evaṃ deveti tatkṣanam eva
XXsamghscu:955: pradhāvitvā, tau puruṣau tataś cārakabandhanān mokṣayitvā, yena taṃ vṛkṣaṃ
XXsamghscu:956: tenopanīyataḥ. 3. atha sa rājā papraccha: kim ayaṃ vṛkṣas tvadvāpitaḥ, eko
XXsamghscu:957: bhūtvā, cchidyamāno dviguṇavṛddhyābhivardhamānaḥ, yāvac caturviṃśatidhā gataḥ? madvāpitas tu vṛkṣo nāṃkurāṇi, na patrāṇi, na puṣpāṇi, na phalāni dattavān? 4. tataḥ sa puruṣa evam āha: yādṛśāni mahārāja mama puṇyāṇi, na tava tādṛśāni puṇyāni saṃvidyante.
XXsamghscu:958: [SaSū(C) 213] 1. atha khalu te triṃśad amātyakoṭyas, tasya puruṣasyobhau jānumaṇḍalau pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya, evam āhuḥ: tvayā rājyaṃ kārayitavyaṃ,
XXsamghscu:959: nāyaṃ pūrvimako rājā śobhate. 2. atha khalu sa puruṣas tān amātyān
XXsamghscu:961: (1) rājyabhogaiś ca me nārtho na dhānyena dhanena vā //
XXsamghscu:963: vrajen nirvāṇadhātau hi śānte yatra tathāgataḥ //
XXsamghscu:965: paryaṃkaṃ sa bandhitvā pratijñām akarot tataḥ //
XXsamghscu:966: (4) pūrvaṃ mayā kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ rājño bandhanam āgataḥ /
XXsamghscu:967: idan tu kṛtvā praṇidhiṃ mama pāpakṣayo bhavet //
XXsamghscu:968: [SaSū(C) 214] 1. atha khalu te caturviṃśati pakṣiṇakukkuṭakoṭyo vajratuṇḍena tūryāṇi parāhanati sma. 2. atha khalu tena kālena tena samayena dvātriṃśati kūṭāgārasahasrāṇi prādurbhūtāni, 3. ekaikaṃ ca kūṭāgāraṃ paṃcaviṃśatiyojanapramāṇaṃ prādurabhavat 4. ekaikasmiṃś ca kūṭāgāre paṃcaviṃśati koṭyo pakṣiṇānāṃ prādurbhūtāni, suvarṇacūḍāni,
XXsamghscu:969: suvarṇatuṇḍāni, suvarṇamukhāni; 5. te mānuṣyakaṃ vācaṃ niścārayanti:
XXsamghscu:970: (1) asādhus te mahārāja yad vṛkṣaś cheditas tvayā /
XXsamghscu:973: na jānīṣe kīdṛśaḥ satvo yenāyaṃ vāpito drumaḥ //
XXsamghscu:975: (3) na jānāmi imam arthaṃ vyākurudhavaṃ mahātapā /
XXsamghscu:979: (5) katamo dvitīyaḥ puroṣo yasya vṛkṣaṃ na rūhati /
XXsamghscu:981: (6) devadatto hi mūḍho 'sau yasya vṛkṣaṃ na rūhati /
XXsamghscu:982: na kṛtaṃ kuśalaṃ kiṃcid ruhyate 'sya kathaṃ druma //
XXsamghscu:983: [SaSū(C) 214] 10. atha khalu tena kālena tena samayena tṛṃśat koṭya 'mātyānām, iman dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā, sarve daśabhūmipratiṣṭhitā,
XXsamghscu:984: abhijñāpratilabdhāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ, sa ca rājā daśabhūmipratiṣṭhitaḥ,
XXsamghscu:986: [SaSū(C) 215] 1. atha khalu bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisatvo mahāsatvo bhagavantam
XXsamghscu:987: etad avocat: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yat triṃśat koṭyo janānāṃ
XXsamghscu:988: daśabhūmipratiṣṭhitā, abhijñāpratilabdhā saṃvṛttāḥ? 2. bhagavān āha: śṛṇu
XXsamghscu:989: bhaiṣajyasena, vyākariṣyāmi. 3. atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ smitaṃ
XXsamghscu:990: prāduṣcakāra. 4. atha tasmin samaye bhagavato mukhadvārāc caturaśīti
XXsamghscu:993: nīlapītalohitāvadātamaṃjiṣṭhāsphaṭikarajatavarṇāni. 5. tā anantāparyantā lokadhātūn avabhāsya, punar eva pratyudāvṛtyā, bhagavantaṃ
XXsamghscu:995: [SaSū(C) 216] 1. atha khalu bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ utthāyāsanād, ekāṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ prāvṛtya, dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ
XXsamghscu:996: pratiṣṭhāpya, yena bhagavāṃs tenāṃjaliṃ praṇamaya, bhagavantam etad avocat: 2. ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya prāduṣkaraṇāya?
XXsamghscu:997: nāhetukaṃ nāpratyayaṃ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ
XXsamghscu:998: prāduṣkurvanti. 3. bhagavān āha: paśyasi tvaṃ bhaiṣajyasena caturdiśaṃ lokadhātau samantāj janakāyam āgacchantaṃ mamāntike? 4. āha: nohīdaṃ bhagavan na paśyāmi. 5. bhagavān āha: tena hi bhaiṣajyasena vyavalokaya,
XXsamghscu:1000: [SaSū(C) 217] 1. atha khalu bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisatvo mahāsatvo vyavalokyādrākṣīt. 2. pūrvasyān diśy eko vṛkṣaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ,
XXsamghscu:1002: janakāyasya sannipatitāni; te ca na bhāṣante, na jalpanti, nālapanti, na
XXsamghscu:1004: dakṣiṇasyān diśy eko vṛkṣaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ, saptayojanasahasrapramāṇaḥ;
XXsamghscu:1005: tatra paṃcaviṃśati koṭīsahasrāṇi janakāyasya sannipatitāni; te na jalpanti, nālapanti, na bhāṣante, nottiṣṭhanti, na caṃkramanti;
XXsamghscu:1006: tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsyanti. 4. paścimāyāṃ diśy eko vṛkṣaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ,
XXsamghscu:1008: sannipatitāni; te na jalpanti, nālapanti, na bhāṣanti, nottiṣṭhanti, na
XXsamghscu:1009: caṃkramanti; tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsayanti. 5. uttarasyān diśy eko vṛkṣaḥ
XXsamghscu:1011: janakāyasya sannipatitāni; te na jalpanti, nālapanti, na bhāṣaṃte, na
XXsamghscu:1013: ūrdhvāyān diśy eko vṛkṣaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ, saptayojanasahasrapramāṇaḥ; tatra paṃcaviṃśati koṭīsahasrāṇi janakāyasya sannipatitāni; te na jalpanti, na
XXsamghscu:1015: adhastāddiśy eko vṛkṣaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ, saptayojanasahasrapramāṇaḥ; tatra ca paṃcaviṃśati koṭīsahasrāṇi janakāyasya sannipatitāni; te na jalpanti,
XXsamghscu:1016: nālapanti, na bhāṣanti, nottiṣṭhanti, na caṃkramanti;
XXsamghscu:1018: [SaSū(C) 218] 1. atha khalu bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisatvo mahāsatvo bhagavantam
XXsamghscu:1019: etad avocat: pṛccheyam ahaṃ bhagavantaṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ kaṃcid eva pradeśaṃ, sacen me bhagavān avakāśaṃ kuryāt pṛṣṭapraśnavyākaraṇāya. 2. evam ukte bhagavān bhaiṣajyasenaṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam etad avocat: pṛccha tvaṃ bhaiṣajyasena yad yad evākāṃkṣasy;
XXsamghscu:1020: ahan te tasya tasyaiva praśnasya paripṛṣṭasya vyākaraṇena cittam ārādhayiṣye.
XXsamghscu:1021: [SaSū(C) 219] 1. evam ukte bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisatvo mahāsatvo bhagavantam
XXsamghscu:1022: etad avocat: kiṃ bhagavaṃś caturdiśe lokadhātuṣu janakāya āgatyāvasthito?
XXsamghscu:1023: yāvad adhastādūrdhvāyāṃ diśi paṃcāśat koṭyo janakāyam āgatyāvasthitaḥ. 2.
XXsamghscu:1024: te ca bhagavantaṃ nālapanti, na saṃlapanti, na jalpanti, na vadanti, na
XXsamghscu:1025: bhāṣanti, nottiṣṭhanti, na caṃkramanti; tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsayanti. ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ? 3. bhagavān āha: gaccha tvaṃ bhaiṣajyasena,
XXsamghscu:1026: svayam eva tāṃs tathāgatān paripṛccha yato lokadhātāv ete janakāyā āgatāḥ.
XXsamghscu:1027: 4. āha: kasya ṛddhibalādhānena gacchāmi? 5. bhagavān āha: svakena bhaiṣajyasena ṛddhibalādhānena
XXsamghscu:1029: bhagavantaṃ tṛguptaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya, tatraivāntardhitaḥ. 2. ṣaṇnavati lokadhātukoṭīr atikramya, candrapradīpā nāma lokadhātuḥ. 3. tatra candrāvatikṣetro nāma tathāgato, 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ,
XXsamghscu:1032: [SaSū(C) 221] 1. atha khalu bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisatvo mahāsatvas tasya
XXsamghscu:1033: bhagavataś candrāvatikṣetrasya tathāgatasya purata sthito, yena bhagavāṃs tenāṃjaliṃ praṇamya, bhagavantam etad avocat: 2. āgato 'smi bhagavan ṣaṇnavati lokadhātukoṭīsahasrāṇy atikramya, nāhaṃ bhagavaṃs tāvanti
XXsamghscu:1034: satvāni kvacit paśyāmi yāvanti tatra dṛṣṭāni.
XXsamghscu:1035: [SaSū(C) 222] 1. sa bhagavān āha: tatraiva bhaiṣajyasena saṃcaranti,
XXsamghscu:1036: saṃtiṣṭhanti. 2. āha: yathā kathaṃ punar bhagavan? 3. bhagavān āha:
XXsamghscu:1037: acetanavṛkṣasaṃbhūtāni satvāni. 4. āha: kena bhagavan dṛṣṭaṃ kena śrutaṃ yad acetane vṛkṣe manuṣyā jāyante? 5. sa bhagavān āha: na bhaiṣajyasena tvayā dṛṣṭaṃ vā na śrutaṃ vā yad acetane vṛkṣe manuṣyā jāyaṃte? 6. āha: na me bhagavan dṛṣṭaṃ na śrutaṃ yad acetane vṛkṣe manuṣyā jāyante. 7. sa bhagavān āha: icchasi tvaṃ bhaiṣajyasena draṣṭuṃ? tad ahaṃ sāṃprataṃ
XXsamghscu:1038: darśayiṣyāmi. 8. āha: icchāmi bhagavann, icchāmi sugata!
XXsamghscu:1039: [SaSū(C) 223] 1. atha khalu bhagavāṃś candrāvatikṣetras tathāgatas tasyāṃ
XXsamghscu:1040: velāyāṃ śatapuṇyavicitritaṃ svaṃ bāhuṃ prasārayati sma, 2. tataś ca bāhutaḥ koṭīśatasahasraṃ janakāyānāṃ prādurabhavat, 3. ekaikaś ca janakāyo
XXsamghscu:1042: atha sa bhagavāṃś candrāvatikṣetras tathāgato bhaiṣajyasenaṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam āmantrayati: paśyasi tvaṃ bhaiṣajyasena? eṣa janakāyas tathāgataṃ nānāgandhamālyavilepanair abhyavakiranti. 5. āha: paśyāmi
XXsamghscu:1043: bhagavan, paśyāmi sugata. 6. sa bhagavān āha: ete acetanā janakāyāḥ
XXsamghscu:1044: prādurbhūtāḥ! ete acetanā manuṣyāḥ! ayonijā ete satvāḥ. 7. atha khalu teṣāṃ koṭīśatasahasrāṇām ekaikasya yad bāhuśataṃ te sarve vikīryante.
XXsamghscu:1045: [SaSū(C) 224] 1. atha khalu bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisatvo mahāsatvas taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagavantam etad avocat: kimidaṃ bhagavan, kimidaṃ sugata yan manuṣyāṇāṃ muhūrtamātreṇa bāhuśataṃ vikīrṇam? 2. yadi bhagavaṃ cchatabāhavo na
XXsamghscu:1046: mucyante, kaḥ punar vādo dvibāhukā manuṣyā mokṣyante! 3. bhagavān āha:
XXsamghscu:1047: evam eva bhaiṣajyasenācetanāḥ satvā jāyante, acetanā niruddhyante. 4.
XXsamghscu:1048: asmākam api bhaiṣajyasena śarīram acetanabhūtaṃ manyitavyaṃ. 5. āha:
XXsamghscu:1049: katame bhagavan satvā ye daharāḥ, katame vṛddhāḥ? 6. bhagavān āha: santi bhaiṣajyasena daharāḥ satvā, santi vṛddhāḥ. 7. āha: katame bhagavan daharāḥ, katame vṛddhāḥ? 8. āha: ye te vṛkṣebhyo nirjātās, te daharāḥ. 9.
XXsamghscu:1050: āha: icchāmi bhagavan daharāṇi satvāni draṣṭum.
XXsamghscu:1051: [SaSū(C) 225] 1. atha khalu sa bhagavāṃś candrāvatikṣetras tathāgato
XXsamghscu:1052: dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇitalaṃ prasārayati. 2. atha daśabhyo digbhyaḥ koṭīśatasahasraṃ janakāyānām āgacchanti; 3. adhastādūrdhvāyān diśi paṃcāśat koṭī
XXsamghscu:1053: janakāyasyāgacchanti; 4. āgatvā ca te janakāyā bhagavataḥ pādau
XXsamghscu:1054: śirasābhivandya, na ca tathāgatam ālapanti, na saṃlapanti;
XXsamghscu:1056: [SaSū(C) 226] 1. atha khalu bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisatvo mahāsatvo bhagavantam
XXsamghscu:1057: etad avocat: kim ete bhagavan satvās tathāgataṃ nālapanti, na saṃlapanti,
XXsamghscu:1058: tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsayanti? 2. bhagavān āha: na jānāsi bhaiṣajyasena?
XXsamghscu:1059: acetanaḥ pṛthivīpradeśe nālapanti, na saṃlapanti, na dharmaskandhaṃ prajānāti. 3. tat kasya hetoḥ? ihaikatyā bhaiṣajyasena daharā satvāḥ notpādaṃ jānanti, na nirodhaṃ jānanti, dṛṣṭvā ca na jarāṃ, na vyādhiṃ, na
XXsamghscu:1060: śokaṃ, na paridevaṃ, na priyaviprayogaṃ, nāpriyasaṃprayogaṃ, na priyād vinābhāvaṃ, na maraṇaṃ, nākālamṛtyum. 4. nāpi tāni sarvakaṭukāni duḥkhāṇi dṛṣṭvā udvegam āpadyante. kutas te jñāsyanti? 5. punaḥ punas te
XXsamghscu:1062: [SaSū(C) 227] 1. atha khalu bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisatvo mahāsatvo bhagavantam
XXsamghscu:1063: etad avocat: kuto bhagavan daharā satvā āgacchanti? kutaś cyavanti?
XXsamghscu:1064: kutropapadyante ye dharmaṃ na jānanti? 2. bhagavān āha: śṛṇu
XXsamghscu:1065: bhaiṣajyasena, yan mānuṣyakam ātmabhāvaṃ pratigṛhṇanti, tan na rupyakāreṇa
XXsamghscu:1066: kṛtaṃ, 3. na cīmarakāreṇa kṛtaṃ, 4. na kāṣṭhakāreṇa kṛtaṃ, 5. na kuṃbhakāreṇa kṛtaṃ. 6. na rājabhayenotpadyante. 7. strīpuruṣasaṃyogāt pāpena karmaṇā saṃyuktāḥ saṃbhavanti. 8. punaḥ punaś ca teṣāṃ satvānāṃ śilpāni śikṣāpayanti. 9. anantaṃ ca kaṭukaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃbhavati. 10. kaṭukā vedanāḥ tatra, teṣāṃ pūrvakṛtānāṃ pāpakānāṃ karmaṇāṃ vipākam, anubhavanti.
XXsamghscu:1067: 11. ihaiva te bhaiṣajyasena daharāḥ satvā āgatā ya ete nālapanti, na
XXsamghscu:1068: saṃlapanti, nottiṣṭhanti. te īdṛśān duḥkhāṃ vedanām anubhavanti! 12. anena kāraṇena bhaiṣajyasena nālapanti, na saṃlapanti. 13. evaṃ te bhaiṣajyasena
XXsamghscu:1069: daharāḥ satvāḥ, kuśalam ajānānāḥ, notpādaṃ jānanti, na nirodhaṃ jānanti,
XXsamghscu:1070: na ca te mānuṣyakam ātmabhāvaṃ pratilapsyante. 14. ime ucyante bhaiṣajyasena daharāḥ satvāḥ.
XXsamghscu:1071: [SaSū(C) 228] 1. āha: kathaṃ bhagavan daharāḥ satvā utpadyante, kathaṃ
XXsamghscu:1072: nirudhyante? 2. bhagavān āha: tadyathāpināma bhaiṣajyasena kaścid eva puruṣo 'gniṃ kāṣṭhena parimārjayeta, tasyānupūrveṇa taṃ kāṣṭham agninā
XXsamghscu:1073: pradīpyeta; 3. evam eva bhaiṣajyasena mānuṣyātmabhāvaṃ prathamaṃ saṃjāyate, jātaṃ ca sad vedanāṃ vedayati. 4. āha: ko 'trābhijāto jātaḥ,
XXsamghscu:1074: kaḥ parinirvṛtaḥ? 5. bhagavān āha: buddha eva bhaiṣajyasenābhijāto jātaḥ,
XXsamghscu:1076: [SaSū(C) 229] 1. tadyathāpināma bhaiṣajyasena kasmiṃścid andhakāragṛhe timirāgāre rājñā puruṣo bandhanāvarodhaḥ kṛtaḥ syāt. 2. tatra sa puruṣo,
XXsamghscu:1077: 'ndhakāragṛhe praviṣṭaḥ, antargṛhe timiraṃ timirāgāraṃ paśyet. 3. athānyaḥ kaścit puruṣaḥ, pūrvaduḥkhavedanābhir dṛṣṭaś, cintayen: naṣṭa eṣa puruṣo,
XXsamghscu:1079: tatrābhyantargṛhe sūkṣmam agniṃ chorayet. 5. sa ca puruṣaś cārakāvaruddhas tam agniraśmiṃ paśyed, dṛṣṭvā cāśvasto bhaved, utsāhaṃ ca vardhayet. 6. sa cāgniḥ kenacid eva hetunā prajvaleta, tena cāgninā prajvālena tad gṛhaṃ samantataḥ prajvalet; sa ca puruṣas tatraiva dahyeta.7. taṃ ca dagdhaṃ
XXsamghscu:1080: rājā śrutvā cintāyāsam āpadyeta; tasyaivaṃ bhaven: na bhūyo 'haṃ svaviṣaye kaṃcit satvaṃ cārakāvarodhaṃ kariṣyāmi. 8. atha sa rājā teṣāṃ svaviṣayanivāsināṃ satvānām evaṃ samāśvāsayet: mā yūyaṃ bhavantaḥ satvā
XXsamghscu:1081: bhāyatha! mā uttrasatha! abhayaṃ yuṣmākaṃ bhavatu! 9. na mama viṣaye bhūyo daṇḍopacāraṃ vā, bandhanāvarodhaṃ vā bhaviṣyati, na ca kasyacit satvasya jīvitavināśaṃ kariṣyāmi. 10. nirbhayā bhavantaḥ satvā yūyaṃ bhavatha!
XXsamghscu:1083: sarvavyādhipraśāntaḥ. 2. yathā sa puruṣo gṛhadāhāt svakāyaṃ dahati,
XXsamghscu:1084: satvānām arthāya hitāya sukhāya ca pratipanno bhavati satvān vadhabandhanāvarodheṣu parimocayituṃ, 3. evam eva tathāgato,
XXsamghscu:1085: rāgadveṣamohamalaprahīṇaḥ, sarvasatvānān dīpa iva loka utpannaḥ, satvān
XXsamghscu:1086: mocayati; 4. narakatiryakpretāsurakāyebhyaḥ daharāṃś ca satvān, vṛddhāṃś ca satvān mocayati.
XXsamghscu:1087: [SaSū(C) 231] 1. atha tāvad evopary antarīkṣād imā gāthā niścacārā:
XXsamghscu:1089: vuptāni yatra bījāni na vināśaṃ vrajanti hi //
XXsamghscu:1093: śāntaṃ kṛtvā sarvalokaṃ buddhaḥ śodheti dakṣiṇāṃ //
XXsamghscu:1094: (4) moceti navakān satvān moceti ca purāṇakān /
XXsamghscu:1097: śāntiḥ kṛtā hi lokesmin paraloke sukhaṃ kṛtaṃ //
XXsamghscu:1098: [SaSū(C) 232] 1. atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ smitaṃ prāduṣcakāra,
XXsamghscu:1100: (1) sādhu darśanu sādhūnāṃ buddhānāṃ sādhu darśanaṃ /
XXsamghscu:1103: ye śroṣyanti idaṃ sūtraṃ padaṃ prāpsyanty anuttaram //
XXsamghscu:1104: [SaSū(C) 233] 1. atha khalu bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisatvo mahāsatvo, yena bhagavāṃs tenāṃjaliṃ praṇāmya, bhagavantam etad avocat: 2. ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ, smitasya prāduṣkaraṇāya? 3. bhagavān āha: paśyasi tvaṃ kulaputraitāni daharāṇi satvāni? 4. āha: paśyāmi bhagavan, paśyāmi
XXsamghscu:1105: sugata. 5. bhagavān āha: sarva ete bhaiṣajyasenādyaiva
XXsamghscu:1108: yojanasahasrāṇy ūrdhavam upary antarīkṣe 'sthād. 2. athāśītir devaputrakoṭīsahasrāṇi bhagavata upari puṣpavarṣaṃ pravarṣanti. 3. te ca daharāḥ satvā dṛṣṭvā sarve 'ñjalayaḥ kṛtvā namaskurvanti.
XXsamghscu:1109: [SaSū(C) 235] 1. atha khalu bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisatvo mahāsatvo antarīkṣastha evaṃ vācaṃ bhāṣate yena trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ
XXsamghscu:1110: śabdenāpūrayati. 2. dvātriṃśan mahānarakopapannāḥ satvās taṃ śabdaṃ śṛṇvanti, 3. dvātriṃśac ca devanikāyās taṃ śabdaṃ śṛṇvanti; 4.
XXsamghscu:1112: caturaśītiś ca nāgarājasahasrāṇi mahāsamudre saṃkṣubdhāni; 6. triṃśat koṭīsahasrāṇi rākṣasānām imaṃ jaṃbudvīpam āgatāni, 7. paṃcaviṃśat koṭīsahasrāṇi pretānāṃ yakṣānāṃ rākṣasānām aḍakavatyāṃ rājadhānyām
XXsamghscu:1114: [SaSū(C) 236] 1. atha khalu bhagavāṃs teṣān daharāṇāṃ satvānān dharman
XXsamghscu:1115: deśayati. 2. daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu koṭīsahasrāṇi bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ svakasvakābhir ṛddhibhir āgatāni. 3. atha khalu bhaiṣajyaseno
XXsamghscu:1116: bodhisatvo mahāsatvo, yena bhagavāṃs tenāṃjaliṃ praṇamaya, bhagavantam etad avocat: bahavo bhagavan, bahavo sugata bodhisatvāḥ sannipatitāḥ
XXsamghscu:1117: sanniṣaṇṇāḥ, 4. bahūni ca bhagavan devanāgāni sannipatitāni sanniṣaṇṇāni,
XXsamghscu:1118: 5. punaś cānekāni rākṣasapretāny, aḍakavatyāṃ rājadhānyām āgatya,
XXsamghscu:1120: [SaSū(C) 237] 1. atha khalu bhagavān bhaiṣajyasenaṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvaṃ
XXsamghscu:1121: āmantrayati: āgaccha kulaputra! 2. atha khalu bhaiṣajyaseno bodhisatvo
XXsamghscu:1122: mahāsatva, ṛddhibalenordhvād avatīrya, yena bhagavāṃs tenāṃjaliṃ
XXsamghscu:1123: praṇamaya, bhagavantam etad avocat: 3. dharmaskandho bhagavan,
XXsamghscu:1124: dharmaskandha ity ucyate? kiyatā bhagavan dharmaskandha iti? 4. bhagavān
XXsamghscu:1125: āha: dharmaskandha iti kulaputrocyate yo brahmacaryaṃ paryeṣate,
XXsamghscu:1126: brahmacaryaṃ paryeṣya sarvapāpād viramati. 5. paśyasi tvaṃ kulaputrāmī
XXsamghscu:1127: daharā satvā abrahmacaryād viramanti? 6. āha: paśyāmi bhagavan, paśyāmi
XXsamghscu:1128: sugata! 7. āha: te nūnan dhāraṇīpratilabdhā bhaviṣyanti,
XXsamghscu:1129: sarvadharmasamanvāgatāś ca bhaviṣyanti. 8. āha: kenopāyena bhagavan bahūni
XXsamghscu:1131: [SaSū(C) 238] 1. atha khalu bhagavāṃ bhaiṣajyasenaṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam
XXsamghscu:1132: āmantrayati: 2. bahavo bhaiṣajyasena satvāḥ santi ye jātir eva duḥkhaṃ na
XXsamghscu:1133: śṛṇvanti, jarā eva duḥkhaṃ na śṛṇvanti, vyādhir eva duḥkhaṃ na śṛṇvanti,
XXsamghscu:1135: apriyasaṃprayogaduḥkhaṃ. 3. maraṇaṃ tu sarvaduḥkhaṃ harati. 4. kāyajīvitam idam ucyate bhaiṣajyasena
XXsamghscu:1136: [SaSū(C) 239] 1. atha khalu te daharāḥ satvā, iman nirdeśaṃ śrutvā, yena bhagavāṃs tenāṃjalayaḥ praṇamaya, bhagavantam etad avocan: asmākam api bhagavan martavyam? 2. bhagavān āha: yuṣmābhir api kulaputrāḥ,
XXsamghscu:1137: sarvasatvaiś ca martavyam iti. 3. ta āhuḥ: kathaṃ bhagavan maraṇakālam
XXsamghscu:1138: ākramati? 4. bhagavān āha: maraṇakāle kulaputrāś carimavijñāne
XXsamghscu:1139: vijñānanirodho nāma vātaḥ, vijñānavibhramo nāma vātaḥ,
XXsamghscu:1140: vijñānasaṃkṣobhasaṃyukto nāma vātaḥ; 5. ime trayaḥ kulaputrā vātā maraṇakālasamaye carimavijñāne saṃluḍanti, saṃkṣubhanti, saṃkṣobham
XXsamghscu:1141: utpādayanti. 6. ta āhuḥ: katamāni bhagavaṃs trīṇi maraṇakālasamaye vijñānanirodhe vartamāne śarīraṃ nirghātayanti? 7. bhagavān āha: śastrakaś ca nāma mārṣāḥ, sūcakaś ca nāma mārṣāḥ, ṣṭhīlakaś ca nāma ye śarīraṃ nirghātayaṃti. 8. āhuḥ: kim etad bhagavaṃ ccharīraṇ nāma? 9. bhagavān āha:
XXsamghscu:1142: ādīptakaś ca nāma mārṣā, 10. dahanavāsakaś ca nāma, 11. meḍikaś ca nāma,
XXsamghscu:1143: 12. śṛṃgārikaś ca nāma, 13. śmaśānikaś ca nāma, 14. durbuddhikaś ca nāma,
XXsamghscu:1144: 15. bhāragurukaś ca nāma, 16. jātiparipīḍitaś ca nāma, 17.
XXsamghscu:1145: jātisaṃkṣubhitaś ca nāma, 18. jīvitaparibhāvikaś ca nāma, 19.
XXsamghscu:1146: maraṇapriyaviprayogakaś ca nāma; 20. ime mārṣā ucyante śarīranāmānaḥ.
XXsamghscu:1147: [SaSū(C) 240] 1. ta āhuḥ: kathaṃ bhagavan mṛyate, kathaṃ jīvati? 2.
XXsamghscu:1148: bhagavān āha: vijñānaṃ nāmāyuṣmanto mriyate, puṇyaṃ nāmāyuṣmanto jīvati!
XXsamghscu:1149: 3. śarīraṃ nāma mārṣā mṛyate, snāyukoṭībhir baddham, 4. caturaśītibhiḥ sirākūrcasahasrai romakūpair baddham, 5. dvādaśabhiḥ sahasrair aṃgānāṃ
XXsamghscu:1150: baddhaṃ, 6. ṣaṣṭyuttarais tribhiḥ śatair asthīnāṃ baddham. 7. caturaśītiḥ kṛmikulaśatāny abhyantare vasanti; 8. teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ prāṇakānāṃ maraṇaṃ
XXsamghscu:1151: saṃvidyate, maraṇanirodhaṃ ca saṃvidyate; 9. tatra sarve te prāṇakā nirāśā bhavanti. 10. yadā sa puruṣo mṛyate, tadā sarvaprāṇakānāṃ vātasaṃkṣobhaḥ
XXsamghscu:1152: saṃluḍati anyonyaparibhākṣanārthāya, 11. tadā te duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ
XXsamghscu:1153: vedayanti. 12. anye punaḥ putraśokaṃ kurvanti, anye duhitṛśokaṃ,
XXsamghscu:1154: jñātiśokaṃ; sarve eva te śokaśalyaviddhāḥ anyonyabhakṣaṇam ārabhante; 13.
XXsamghscu:1155: sarve te anupūrveṇa parasparaṃ bhakṣayanta. 14. dvau prāṇakāv avatiṣṭhante. tau saptāham abhiyudhyataḥ. yāvat saptāhe 'tikrānte tata ekaḥ prāṇako nirmathyate, eko mucyate. 15. tat katama āyuṣmanta ucyate
XXsamghscu:1156: dharmaḥ? 16. tat kiṃ manyadhve? yathā sarvaprāṇakānām anyonyavirodhena
XXsamghscu:1158: [SaSū(C) 241] 1. evam eva bālapṛthagjanā satvā anyonyavirodham āpadyante:
XXsamghscu:1159: 2. te jātyā na bibhyanti, vyādhibhyo na bibhyanti, maraṇān na bibhyanti.
XXsamghscu:1160: 3. yathā tau dvau prāṇakau yudhyataḥ, evam eva bālapṛthagjanāḥ parasparaṃ
